column3: and are actively trying to shout down opposition. Whether this will mean a victory in the current election is unknown.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: and so far has proceeded smoothly. Debates are being carried out in the usual manner
column3: and there are no reports of violence in $CAPITAL$ or elsewhere. Supporters of the ruling regime have turned out in force
column4: as have the hopefuls seeking to defeat the current government.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: with the leader of the conservative party declaring victory from the steps of the presidential palace in $CAPITAL$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
with the leader of the socialist party declaring victory from the steps of the presidential palace in $CAPITAL$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
with the leader of the liberal party declaring victory from the steps of the presidential palace in $CAPITAL$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
with the leader of the communist party declaring victory from the steps of the presidential palace in $CAPITAL$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
with the leader of the fascist party declaring victory from the steps of the presidential palace in $CAPITAL$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
with the leader of the reactionary party declaring victory from the steps of the presidential palace in $CAPITAL$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
with the leader of the anarcho-liberal party declaring victory from the steps of the presidential palace in $CAPITAL$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
with the leader of the social liberal party declaring victory from the steps of the presidential palace in $CAPITAL$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98400;Now that a true Jewish homeland has been established
column2: Israel will begin to draw many Jewish people who live in countries across the world-- though this will inevitably anger many neighboring Islamic countries who object to its presence.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
having originally arrived in $COUNTRY$ as a result of the diaspora
column3: are reportedly planning on emigrating to Israel-- the newly-established Jewish homeland in the Palestine. We could encourage them to remain, but that might not be a simple matter.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98600;There has been an increasing desire among the people of $COUNTRY$ to gain our full independence. Crowds gathering in $CAPITAL$ have demanded an end to rule by our distant overlords
column2: and while many in the government are sympathetic with their cries there are also those who fear such a demand could lead to war. Any attempts to achieve independence should ideally take a diplomatic route first
column3: with friendly ties maintained if peaceful separation becomes a reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98605;Diplomats from $FROMCOUNTRY$ arrived in $CAPITAL$ this month
column2: presenting a formal request for their full independence from $COUNTRY$. They assure us that they fully intend to maintain ties with our nation
column3: and have agreed to move forward as $COUNTRY_ADJ$ allies
column4: but that they desire their freedom even so. There are many who feel such a request is beyond the pale and must be refused out of hand. Still others say that if $FROMCOUNTRY$ is denied
column5: we could be facing a rebellion-- and is it not better than to have a friendly ally than a recalcitrant and unwilling subject?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government has denied our request for independence. It seems our only option is rebellion-- as unrealistic as some claim that option to be.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98607;Our diplomacy has proven successful: $COUNTRY$ has been granted full autonomy
column2: on the condition that friendly ties be maintained with $FROMCOUNTRY$. Crowds have gathered in $CAPITAL$ to cheer on our Independence Day!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98610;It appears the time for diplomacy has ended. We have received word from the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government that they have demanded independence-- or it will be war.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: there has been talk of open rebellion in the streets of $CAPITAL$. Fighting against our overlords might surely result in us being crushed
column3: however. Since we have no recourse
column4: secretly approaching some of the enemies of our overlord might gain us some allies in the war to come.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98612;Representatives from $FROMCOUNTRY$ have quietly approached us
column2: asking to set up an alliance with $COUNTRY$ should their demand for independence go unheeded. So far
column3: they say
column4: diplomatic efforts have proven fruitless... so $COUNTRY_ADJ$ assistance would be invaluable to them
column5: and perhaps gain us a new ally.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98620;The Ottoman government had a number of policies regarding the treatment of Christians within the Empire which were considered oppressive: the capitulation tax
column2: known as the Jizya
column3: as well as controls over Christians which did not permit them to become soldiers or hold public office. It was not until the Hatt-i Humayun in 1856-- also known as the Imperial Reform Edict
column4: part of the Tanzimat Reforms-- that things actually began to improve for minorities.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98625;A group of liberal intellectuals known as the 'Young Ottomans'
column2: led by the statesman reformer Midhat Pasha and influenced by the Liberal Revolutions elsewhere in Europe
column3: have proposed a new constitution-- the 'Kanûn-i Esâsî' or 'Basic Law'-- which would see an elected parliament created
column4: would limit the powers of the Sultan
column5: and speed up the Tanzimat Reforms. Conservative members of the Ottoman government claim that giving into these liberals will only speed up the erosion of long-held traditions
column6: while others say that the reforms are sorely needed to stave off the decline of the Empire at the hands of nationalists.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98626;The current state of unrest within the Empire has reached the point where the Sultan has been advised to abrogate the Ottoman Constitution. Absolute power must be returned to the monarchy in order to stamp out the militants-- and while there are those who say that such action will only foster more unrest
column2: there are others who are all too aware that failing to do so will make the Sultan look weak. It is not beyond the realm of possibility that reactionaries might seek to restore the monarchy by force-- or
column3: even worse
column4: seek to abolish it altogether.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98630;With the recent loss of European territories
column2: nationalists within $COUNTRY$ have been inspired to rise up. $COUNTRY_ADJ$ officials are concerned we could be seeing a string of rebellions in the years to come
column3: and already the army is scrambling to contain any efforts at rebel organization.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98635;Spurred on by the continuing lack of reform
column2: Ottoman liberals have radicalized into the 'Young Turks'. They seek to restore the consitutional monarchy
column3: by force if need be
column4: and there are those who have advised the government that these liberals must be dealt with harshly before they grow into a real problem.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98636;Turkish liberals have grown increasingly defiant of the Ottoman monarchy-- to the point where they suggest that the Sultan must be overthrown
column2: replaced with a modern republic. They reject the notion of Ottomanism
column3: saying it has already led to the Empire's decline
column4: and that the way to restoring the nation's glory is to put the good of the Turkish people ahead of all other concerns... including religious.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98650;The call from $FROMCOUNTRY$ has come to $COUNTRY$
column2: asking us to unify with their nation into a greater state-- one which will forge a greater power in a new world order. There are those $COUNTRY_ADJ$ citizens who fear losing our identity in such a union
column3: but many welcome the nation and rightly state that $FROMCOUNTRY$'s influence in $COUNTRY$ is already great. If we deny the union
column4: the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government may decide to enforce their claim on us whether we like it or not.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98651;The call from $FROMCOUNTRY$ has come to $COUNTRY$
column2: asking us to unify with their nation into a greater Islamic state-- one which will forge new world power. There are those $COUNTRY_ADJ$ citizens who fear losing our identity in such a union
column3: and some who object to our joining with a country ruled by fundamentalists. But
column4: for the good of all Islamic peoples
column5: should we not consider our fate?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Hungarians have agreed to expand the Austro-Hungarian union into a federation with the other Danubian cultures even if it means giving up some of their traditional claims to those lands. We may now proceed to propose the union to other local governments with full confidence that both our governments are behind it.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

the Hungarians have agreed to expand the Austro-Hungarian union into a federation with the other Danubian cultures... on one condition: that they be elevated to a fully autonomous state tied to the federation only in matters of foreign relations. We can ignore their proposal
column3: but not without causing a great deal of discontent among the Hungarian people. Sadly
column4: this appears to be as far as their government will go on the matter.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Hungarians have outright refused the proposed federation. They do not wish to lose their equal standing with the Austrian government
column3: and see no benefit in surrendering claims to their traditional territories. We can ignore their refusal and proceed with the federation anyhow
column4: but not without upsetting the Hungarian people greatly.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Czechs have agreed to the proposed Danubian Federation without reservation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

the Czechs have agreed to the proposed Danubian Federation... on one condition: that they be elevated to a fully autonomous state tied to the federation only in matters of foreign relations. We can ignore their proposal
column3: but not without causing a great deal of discontent among the Czech people. Sadly
column4: this appears to be as far as they will go on the matter.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column3: but not without upsetting the Czech people greatly.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column4: this appears to be as far as they will go on the matter.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column4: this appears to be as far as they will go on the matter.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98710;Resentment has been brewing among Hungarians ever since the federation's formation. Their leaders have been loudly proclaiming that they gave no approval for this violation of their constitutional rights
column2: and that German officials proceeded regardless of Hungarian concerns. In some cities
column3: the protests have even become violent and authorities report difficulty in keeping things under control.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98711;Resentment has been brewing among the Czechs ever since the federation's formation. Their leaders have been loudly proclaiming that German officials proceeded regardless of Czech concerns. In some cities
column2: the protests have even become violent and authorities report difficulty in keeping things under control.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98712;Resentment has been brewing among the Romanians ever since the federation's formation. Their leaders have been loudly proclaiming that German officials proceeded regardless of Romanian concerns. In some cities
column2: the protests have even become violent and authorities report difficulty in keeping things under control.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98713;Resentment has been brewing among the Croatians ever since the federation's formation. Their leaders have been loudly proclaiming that German officials proceeded regardless of Croatian concerns. In some cities
column2: the protests have even become violent and authorities report difficulty in keeping things under control.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98714;Resentment has been brewing among the Slovenes ever since the federation's formation. Their leaders have been loudly proclaiming that German officials proceeded regardless of Slovene concerns. In some cities
column2: the protests have even become violent and authorities report difficulty in keeping things under control.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98715;Resentment has been brewing among the Slovakians ever since the federation's formation. Their leaders have been loudly proclaiming that German officials proceeded regardless of Slovakian concerns. In some cities
column2: the protests have even become violent and authorities report difficulty in keeping things under control.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98716;Resentment has been brewing among the Polish ever since the federation's formation. Their leaders have been loudly proclaiming that German officials proceeded regardless of Polish concerns. In some cities
column2: the protests have even become violent and authorities report difficulty in keeping things under control.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

the entire basis for the Danubian Federation has begun to crumble. The other ethnic groups are questioning the dominance that the German majority will exert without the Hungarians to counter-balance them
column3: and increasingly there are demands for the federation to be undone. Some Germans are fine with this
column4: preferring to return to the Austria that was
column5: but many of them say that these other groups should not be permitted to break away. They say the Austrian Empire should be restored-- by force
column6: if need be.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98721;With the Danubian government having become a totalitarian regime
column2: resentment among the various ethnic groups has reached a boiling point. They are demanding their independence
column3: something which would see an end to the federation as it currently exists. The German majority is fine with this
column4: though some are also suggesting the temerity of these rebels is beyond the pale and the federation should be maintained-- by force
column5: if need be.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98725;The call has gone out across the world: a nation has risen to lead the arab masses into the future
column2: a greater power that can withstand the onslaught of colonialism by the European powers. They must rise up and join $COUNTRY$
column3: or forever spend their lives as servants to foreign masters.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98735;A sentiment of Islamic nationalism is sweeping $COUNTRY$
column2: as people begin to clamor for unification with the Islamic Caliphate. We have little reason to doubt that they would object to a petition of annexation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC98800;With the arrival of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ colonial governor into $PROVINCENAME$
column2: an effort has begun to incorporate $COUNTRY_ADJ$ $STATENAME$ into the larger Nigerian colony.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1316081;A drunken riot by a large group of British sailors ashore at Kowloon has resulted in the death of a local man. By rights
column2: the sailors should be tried and executed by the Qing magistrate. The British
column3: however
column4: have demanded extraterritoriality-- meaning their citizens would be tried by British judges. This will inevitably lead to their release and the anger of our citizens
column5: but demanding these mens' executions could lead to war.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1316082;The war with $FROMCOUNTRY$ is not going well. These damnable foreigners are in our lands and blockading our ports
column2: and to the embarassment of our government there seems to be little we can do to stop them. $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ diplomats have approached us to negotiate a 'fair' settlement. While we could drag the war on and see if the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ have the wherewithal to finish their assault
column3: it might be in our best interest to give them a concession port and reparations. Indeed
column4: this might even help us in some ways
column5: though the loss to our prestige would be considerable.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1316083;The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ rulership has signed our peace treaty
column2: granting us a concession port on their coast as well as reparations. This has improved relations between our countries tremendously
column3: and should go a long way to ensuring $COUNTRY_ADJ$ influence in China remains strong.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1316084;The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ have refused to submit. The war must go on.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC1316085;The war with $FROMCOUNTRY$ is not going well. The damnable Japanese are in our lands and blockading our ports
column2: and to the embarassment of our government there seems to be little we can do to stop them. $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ diplomats have approached us to negotiate a 'fair' settlement-- hand over Formosa and pay reparations. While we could drag the war on and see if the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ have the wherewithal to finish their assault
column3: it might be in our best interest to give them what they want
column4: though the loss to our prestige would be considerable.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1316086;The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ rulership has signed our peace treaty
column2: granting us Formosa as well as reparations. This has improved relations between our countries tremendously
column3: and should go a long way to ensuring $COUNTRY_ADJ$ influence in Asia remains strong.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1316175;We have lost all patience with the barbarians who call themselves our 'masters'. They ignore our laws
column2: our customs
column3: and force themselves upon the generosity of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ throne at every opportunity. It is time we turned them out
column4: refused them their free reign in our lands and ports
column5: and demonstrated the true might of our Emperor.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: laced with bitterness over our nation's superiority. Lately the situation has reached a boiling point
column3: and we have received a report that the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ envoy to the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ court has been ejected. Indeed
column4: $COUNTRY_ADJ$ nationals throughout $FROMCOUNTRY$ are reporting harassment and outright violence. $COUNTRY_ADJ$ are being refused berth at Chinese harbors. This is a systematic campaign by the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ emperor to reduce our influence.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: nor interest in
column3: foreigners and their gifts no matter how ingenious they may be. It is only due to the emperor's generosity that foreigners are allowed to trade at all
column4: and all such trade must take place at our will. The yi barbarians should tremble as they obey us and show no negligence! Barbarians shall bow down before the Chinese emperor in the manner customary for tributary envoys.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1316181;Qing officials recently boarded the Arrow
column2: a Chinese-owned ship (a lorcha) that was suspected of piracy and smuggling. Twelve Chinese crew members were arrested on suspicion of piracy by the Qing authorities. British officials have demanded the release of the sailors
column3: however
column4: claiming that because the ship had recently been British-registered
column5: it was under their protection. The Imperial court has been enraged by this claim
column6: suggesting that agreeing to British demands would give smugglers free reign throughout China.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1316182;Qing officials recently boarded the Arrow
column2: a ship that-- according to all reports-- was flying British colors at the time. The Chinese claim this isn't the case
column3: and we've received news that they intend to crack down on the opium trade throughout the Empire. The British government is up in arms
column4: saying that we must exert our influence over the Qing if we are to retain our position in the Far East.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC131709;An incident that began with drunken sailors murdering a Chinese man has escalated into a larger crisis with the Qing government. We have insisted that these sailors be tried by a British judge-- the barbaric Chinese judicial system would result in these men getting anything but a fair trial. The chinese have demanded the men be turned over
column2: and what's more that they be given the right to punish British citizens as needed. The confrontation has resulted in larger trade sanctions being applied against British merchants
column3: and threats of worse. Our prestige as an Empire to be reckoned with is being threatened.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC131710;In a display of diplomatic force
column2: $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ diplomats have forced $COUNTRY$ to sign a treaty with them
column3: forcing numerous trade as well as territory concessions.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC131711;British diplomats have approached the Tibet government
column2: hoping to broker a peaceful arrangement between Tibet and China now that Tibet is independent. No doubt they intend to gain influence and territory in our nation
column3: as well as an ally against Chinese aggression
column5: but the prospect of war should the negotiations fail seems likely.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC131712;British diplomats have approached the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government
column2: hoping to broker a peaceful arrangement between Tibet and $COUNTRY$ now that Tibet is independent. No doubt they intend to gain influence and territory in Tibet
column3: as well as an ally against $COUNTRY_ADJ$ aggression
column5: but the prospect of war should the negotiations fail seems likely.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC131713;$FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ have agreed to the arrangements made at the Simla Convention
column2: and our relations with them have improved as a result-- not to mention our prestige.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC131714;$FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ have refused the arrangements made at the Simla Convention
column2: and our relations with them have cooled as a result.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC131715;Our efforts to modernize the Beiyang army have borne fruit
column2: but this has necessitated the division of authority among regional forces. The generals in charge of these forces
column3: 'warlords' as some call them
column4: have been gaining a great deal of power. They are part of the Beiyang Army
column5: but fight amongst themselves... And
column6: far worse
column7: are critical of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government. We will need to watch these generals carefully.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC131720;Warlord influence has begun to spread into $STATENAME$. These generals are still loyal to $COUNTRY$
column2: but it is becoming increasingly apparent that they are taking control of a significant portion of the country. Officials in $CAPITAL$ are alarmed.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC131730;Resistance against the $CAPITAL$ government has culminated in a breakdown in authority. What began with several of the outlying warlords declaring their indepedence has ended with the most powerful generals in the Beiyang Army struggling for control. A contest has begun regarding who will control the future of China's destiny
column2: and most are certain it will not be long before the entire nation is engulfed in war.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

we must choose where we stand in the ensuing struggle for the nation's destiny: either side with the Kuomintang and fight for domination of the republic or side with the Beiyang and fight for domination of a united China. Alternatively
column3: we can declare our neutrality in the conflict and let the chips fall where they may.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC131736;A $COUNTRY_ADJ$ general by the name of Feng Yuxiang has betrayed his superiors and broken off from the Beiyang armies. He and his supporters have taken the territory under their control and formed a new clique
column2: swearing to topple the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC131740;The leaders of the Kuomintang are preparing for their drive on Beijing
column2: and $COUNTRY$ is expected to answer the call. Either we side with Nationalist China now
column3: or we must abandon the Kuomintang cause and seek our own destiny.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: and will unite their forces with ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC131742;The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people are crying out for the nation to once again unify. We must gather our strength and strike out at those who would divide China
column2: leaving it weak for foreigners to prey upon. Already the banners are in the streets
column3: and $COUNTRY$'s generals are saying now is the time to launch an offensive.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC131743;We have received reports that the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ army is massing on our mutual border
column2: ready to make a massive offensive into $COUNTRY_ADJ$ territory. It seems a war is upon us
column3: whether we like it or not: either they destroy us or we destroy them.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC131745;The call has come from the capital: the era of warlords is over
column2: and all the Chinese peoples must unite under a single flag. This means $COUNTRY$ must either submit to Beijing's rule or face more war against a strong and unified foe. Your generals stand ready to receive your command.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC131746;Now that we own the island of Formosa
column2: the local Min population has begun to organize itself-- presumably towards the end of breaking away from $COUNTRY_ADJ$ control.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1600010;It is as we feared-- the so-called 'Heavenly Kingdom' has assumed control of lands in the south
column2: and any attempts by the local governors to resume authority have failed. It is an embarassment to the prestige of the Imperial throne that we must deign to recognize that these rebels exist and must be dealt with once and for all. Some are even beginning to question the Mandate of Heaven if such a threat is possible. If we do not act
column3: however
column4: the rebels will surely gain control over not only the south but perhaps all of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC160004;Though we are not yet done battling the hated Manchu
column2: for the moment the Heavenly Kingdom claims victory. We have forced a truce
column3: and now the Manchu will need to deal with rebellions across their land as the people realize their mandate to rule no longer exists. All the world watches us.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC160006;The continued existence of the Taiping rebels is an embarassment to the Qing government and our Emperor. Calls have been made for the war to resume
column2: and this time for a national effort be started to draft men into the Qing army. There will be considerable resistance
column3: but the Emperor has decreed that the Heavenly Kingdom must be destroyed!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC160007;The truce with the Qing Emperor has come to an end
column2: and already the calls have begun for the Taiping Revolution to continue. The Manchu must be thrown down! All of China must be freed!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC160008;We have overthrown the hated Manchu and taken control of all China. Now
column2: as the world watches
column3: the true test comes: transforming the nation into the true Heavenly Kingdom.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC160011;Due to the low value assigned to the birth of daughters
column2: female infanticide has become wide-spread across much of China. The practice has become so common
column3: in fact
column4: it has led to a shortage of women.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC160012;We have received reports of Christian missionaries in $PROVINCENAME$
column2: followers of the so-called 'Heavenly Kingdom'. Their actions would not be so objectionable if they were not also preaching sedition against the Manchu-- and
column3: far worse
column4: though provincial governors have attempted to halt the missionaries this has only seemed to stir up support for them even further. There are sightings of their pamphlets all over $STATENAME$ now!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Qing Dynasty is seen as ineffective and corrupt
column3: ruled by Manchu foreigners. Bitter hatred has been stirring
column4: particularly in the south. This is especially true in $STATENAME$
column5: where there are reports of rioting after a recent confrontation between locals and Manchu officials.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC160017;Followers of the 'Heavenly Kingdom' are causing further problems in the south. They are already heavily fortified within $PROVINCENAME$
column2: and many Qing advisors consider it completely beyond our control. Anarchy seems rampant
column3: and all throughout $STATENAME$ these rebels are shouting treason. Can nobody do something about this?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC160020;The followers of the so-called 'Heavenly Kingdom' have spread their influence even further. According to officials in $STATENAME$
column2: the Christian rebels have been spotted in $PROVINCENAME$ and sentiment against the Qing Dynasty is on the rise throughout the entire state.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the glorious and most holy Hong Xiuquan
column3: has passed away-- ascended into Heaven to receive his just rewards from God. Those of us who remain must now look to what will become of the Heavenly Kingdom without his guidance. There are some who say that his son
column4: Hong Tianguifu
column5: should be given the reins of power. Others say that Hong Tianguifu is a buffoon and that a proper republic is the way forward. Still others say the unthinkable-- that Hong Xiuquan's death is a sign that the Heavenly Kingdom has lost favor with God
column6: and that the only way to restore it is restore the Qing Dynasty to the Imperial throne-- without
column7: of course
column8: allowing the Manchu to rule the south like errant lapdogs.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC160026;With our holdings on the mainland lost
column2: all we have left is our stronghold on the island of Formosa. The suggestion among what little remains of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government is that we abandon $CAPITAL$ and move the capital to Taibei. This does not guarantee our safety by any means
column3: but it may be the only means of survival we possess.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC160501;Christian missionaries are stirring up trouble in southern China
column2: handing out pamphlets in an effort to gain converts. This would not be so objectionable were the pamphlet not also preaching sedition against the Qing Dynasty. The fact that so many in $PROVINCENAME$ are willing to listen to these fools is worrying.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the Qing Dynasty is seen as ineffective and corrupt
column3: ruled by Manchu foreigners. Bitter hatred has been stirring
column4: particularly in the south. This is especially true in $PROVINCENAME$
column5: where there are reports of rioting after a recent confrontation between locals and Manchu officials.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1605020;After a period of self-enforced isolation
column2: Hong Xiuquan has died-- some say of poison
column3: others of illness. Regardless of the cause
column4: the nation has been thrown into mourning for their beloved leader. Hong Xiuquan's son
column5: Hong Tianguifu
column6: is ready to step into his father's role as leader
column7: but there are some who fear he will be unsuitable. They are advocating a restoration of the Qing dynasty. Others say that $COUNTRY$ must become a republic
column8: in emulation of western powers. Whether $COUNTRY$ is ready for such a change is difficult to say.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC16050214;With our holdings on the mainland lost
column2: all we have left is our stronghold on the island of Taiwan. The suggestion among what little remains of the Kuomintang government is that we abandon $CAPITAL$ and move the capital to Taipei. This does not guarantee our safety by any means
column3: but it may be the only means of survival we possess.  We shall however never relinquish our rightful claim to the mainland.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: their provinces occupied and their government retreating to Taiwan it has become clear that the Kuomintang no longer has the will to fight.  We may now claim dominance over China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC162503;The followers of the so-called 'Heavenly Kingdom' have infested yet another province. According to officials in $PROVINCENAME$
column2: followers of Hong Xiuquan have been spotted and sentiment against the Qing Dynasty is on the rise.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC164503;A troublemaker has arisen in the southern lands. According to reports
column2: this man claims to have received a vision to the effect that he is the younger brother of Jesus Christ and was sent to rid China of the corrupt Manchu Qing Dynasty rulers. He has been winning converts to Christianity
column3: and it seems there are many willing to listen to his words of sedition and join his so-called 'Heavenly Kingdom'.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC164504;The man behind the so-called 'Heavenly Kingdom' has been given a name: Hong Xiuquan. A former farmer who attempted the civil service examinations in Guangzhou and failed
column2: he has now become a charismatic visionary taking advantage of anti-Manchu sentiment in the south. Some say he is crazed and mad
column3: but regardless he is a danger to the Qing Dynasty and his words are finding eager ears.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC164505;Reports have arrived at the palace that a firewood seller has taken to walking the Southlands
column2: claiming to speak with the voice of God. Regardless of his seeming madness
column3: the man has proven very effective at spreading the word of the so-called 'Heavenly Kingdom'.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC164599;The forces of revolution have turned against the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Emperor. With dissent threatening to spread into chaos
column2: leaders of the Beiyang army have demanded the Emperor abdicate his throne. Cheering crowds in $CAPITAL$ greeted the news
column3: but few are aware of the forces now lining up to take control of the government. Kuomintang revolutionaries have demanded a transformation of $COUNTRY$ into a republic with free elections. Army leaders
column4: however
column5: have threatened to oppose the Kuomintang and demanded the republic be under strict Beiyang control.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC164600;Revolutionary societies are springing up all over China
column2: and recently we have received word that several of these societies have banded together as the Tongmenghui or 'Chinese United League'. Their stated goal is the revival of Zhonghua
column3: or the concept that China should be a nation ruled by a republic that represents all of its various peoples. These revolutionaries wish to see $COUNTRY$ freed of foreigner influence
column4: and do not seem satisifed to wait and see what reforms the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ monarchy will provide. What's more worrying is that some of the regional warlords appear to be assisting them.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC164601;Revolutionaries seeking to bring down the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ monarchy have been stirring up a revolt in $STATENAME$. The incident appears to have begun in $PROVINCENAME$
column2: after a demonstration by local workers turned violent. Though authorities have already moved in
column3: the damage is done. What remains is to determine how we react to this outrageous provocation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC164602;Members of the proto-nationalist Yihetuan Movement
column2: also known as the Boxers
column3: have staged an uprising in $PROVINCENAME$. While the uprising was initially put down by $COUNTRY_ADJ$ forces
column4: news of the movement's presence has spread throughout $STATENAME$ and already there are more reports of clashes.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC199005;We have reports from $PROVINCENAME$ that a new vein of coal has been discovered
column2: and considering the unemployment in $PROVINCENAME$ this might prove to be a boon indeed.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC199006;We have reports from $PROVINCENAME$ that a new vein of copper has been discovered
column2: and considering the unemployment in $PROVINCENAME$ this might prove to be a boon indeed.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: and considering the unemployment in $PROVINCENAME$ this might prove to be a boon indeed.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: and considering the unemployment in $PROVINCENAME$ this might prove to be a boon indeed.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC199009;We have reports from $PROVINCENAME$ that a new vein of sulphur has been discovered
column2: and considering the unemployment in $PROVINCENAME$ this might prove to be a boon indeed.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC199015;Considering the levels of unemployment in $PROVINCENAME$
column2: local landowners have begun a movement to switch to the production of cash crops-- in this case cotton
column3: which appears to suited to the local terrain. Whether such a plan would help $PROVINCENAME$ in the long run is unknown
column4: but the landowners are asking for the government's assistance in promoting cotton production.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column3: which appears to suited to the local terrain. Whether such a plan would help $PROVINCENAME$ in the long run is unknown
column4: but the landowners are asking for the government's assistance in promoting wool production.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column3: which appears to suited to the local terrain. Whether such a plan would help $PROVINCENAME$ in the long run is unknown

column4: but the landowners are asking for the government's assistance in promoting tobacco production.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column3: which appears to suited to the local terrain. Whether such a plan would help $PROVINCENAME$ in the long run is unknown
column4: but the landowners are asking for the government's assistance in promoting coffee production.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column4: but the landowners are asking for the government's assistance in promoting sugar production.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC199030;Unemployment among workers in $PROVINCENAME$ is high
column2: and many have begun turning to the sea to eke out a living. Local officials are suggesting that the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ support them.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC199031;Unemployment among workers in $PROVINCENAME$ is high
column2: but a possible bright spot is the emergence of several lumberyards. Local officials are suggesting that the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ support the lumberyards and allow them to become $PROVINCENAME$'s new major industry.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC199032;Unemployment among workers in $PROVINCENAME$ is high
column2: but a possible bright spot is the emergence of several tropical lumberyards. Local officials are suggesting that the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ support the lumberyards and allow them to become $PROVINCENAME$'s new major industry.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC199033;Unemployment among workers in $PROVINCENAME$ is high
column2: but a possible bright spot is the emergence of several cattle ranches. Local officials are suggesting that the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ support the ranches and allow them to become $PROVINCENAME$'s new major industry.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC199034;Unemployment among workers in $PROVINCENAME$ is high
column2: but a possible bright spot is the emergence of several new grain farms. Local officials are suggesting that the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ support the farms and allow them to become $PROVINCENAME$'s new major industry.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800012;We have been secretly approached by certain members within the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government
column2: suggesting that $COUNTRY_ADJ$ intervention to free them from foreign control might be in both our interests. $FROMCOUNTRY$ would be free to seek its own destiny
column3: while $COUNTRY$ would gain an ally. The catch
column4: of course
column5: is that the attempt could look like interference to the rest of the world... and earn us the enmity of $FROMCOUNTRY$'s rulers in particular. If we make the attempt
column6: we should learn of the results within a week at the most.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800013;A foreign power has meddled in the affairs of $FROMCOUNTRY$
column2: taking advantage of the unrest there to engineer a coup which has freed them from our control. Our trusted servants in that nation have been either arrested or expelled
column3: and now the world watches for our response.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800014;A foreign power has meddled in the affairs of $FROMCOUNTRY$
column2: taking advantage of the unrest there to engineer a coup which has freed them from our control. Our trusted servants in that nation have been either arrested or expelled
column3: and now the world watches for our response.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800015;The answer from $FROMCOUNTRY$ is clear: they won't intervene in our internal affairs. We are on our own.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: but the resulting orgy of violence in $CAPITAL$ has failed to drive out the influence of our overlord. Worse
column3: it has resulted in $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ influence in $COUNTRY$ being greatly damaged
column4: as many see them as instigators rather than would-be liberators.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800017;$FROMCOUNTRY$ has supported the coud d'etat in $CAPITAL$
column2: but with the change came an orgy of violence that has seen $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ influence in $COUNTRY$ damaged along with that of our overlord. Many people in $COUNTRY$ are left with hard feelings
column3: and see $FROMCOUNTRY$ as an instigator rather than a liberator. What will come next depends entirely on whether reprisals will come our way.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800018;$FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ intervention has succeeded in freeing our government from foreign rule. After an orgy of violence in $CAPITAL$
column2: citizens are celebrating in the streets. $COUNTRY$ has a new destiny as a truly independent nation... provided no reprisals come out way
column3: of course.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800021;A foreign power attempted to use their influence in $FROMCOUNTRY$ to take advantage of the unrest there and free them from our control. Their efforts have come to naught
column2: and their agents have been arrested and many of the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ malcontents exposed and imprisoned. The question remains
column3: however
column4: as to what we will do in response to this outrage.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800022;Our attempt to interfere in $FROMCOUNTRY$'s government was thwarted. We have lost influence there
column2: and angered their overlord. This may lead to war
column3: but we will have to wait and see what develops.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800023;Our attempt to engineer a coup in $FROMCOUNTRY$ was successful
column2: but at the cost of a great deal of our influence there. The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government is angry
column3: and it's possible their overlords may attempt to retaliate either against them or against us. We will have to wait and see what develops of this.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800024;Our attempt to engineer a coup in $FROMCOUNTRY$ was successful
column2: and they are now an independent country as well as a useful ally. It's possible their overlords may attempt to retaliate either against them or against us. We shall have to wait and see what develops.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800050;Reactionary elements have taken over the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government
column2: and their influence is felt both here and abroad. Their leadership has already begun to institute widespread changes in the government
column3: while crowds cheer from the central square in $CAPITAL$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800051;Fascist elements have taken over the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government
column2: and their influence is felt both here and abroad. Their leadership has already begun to institute widespread changes in the government
column3: while crowds cheer from the central square in $CAPITAL$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800052;Communists have taken over the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government
column2: and their influence is felt both here and abroad. Their leadership has already begun to institute widespread changes in the government
column3: while crowds cheer from the central square in $CAPITAL$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800053;Liberal extremists have taken over the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government
column2: dedicated to political reforms but opposed to social reform of any kind. They have already instituted a large number of changes within the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government
column3: while crowds cheer from the central square in $CAPITAL$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800054;Cheering crowds in $CAPITAL$ are celebrating the toppling of the old $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government
column2: now replaced by a new and liberal order dedicated to political reform within all levels of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government. Despite their recent ascent to power
column3: they have already begun to institute changes in $COUNTRY$ that are being felt here and abroad.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC810055;Rebel leaders have announced from $CAPITAL$ that $COUNTRY$ has at last achieved independence. What this means for $COUNTRY$'s future is so far unknown
column2: but for the moment it seems that the government will proceed intact-- save for the fact that it is no longer beholden to its former overlord.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC810056;Cheering crowds in $CAPITAL$ are celebrating the toppling of the old $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government
column2: now replaced by a new and socialist order dedicated to social reform within all levels of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government. Despite their recent ascent to power
column3: they have already begun to institute changes in $COUNTRY$ that are being felt here and abroad.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC810057;The old $COUNTRY_ADJ$ regime leftover from our days as a colony are now over-- $COUNTRY$ is once more an African nation
column2: truly belonging to the people who have lived here since long before the Europeans arrived.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
and the rebel government has declared themselves free from $COUNTRY_ADJ$ rule. Many are calling for a restoration of order
column3: while others are saying that $FROMCOUNTRY$ is too much trouble. If they want to be free
column4: let them go.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: and the rebels blame $COUNTRY_ADJ$ influence as one of the primary causes of the old regime's corruption. We have lost our influence in $FROMCOUNTRY$ as a result
column3: and the only question that remains is whether we wish to press our claim by force.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800060;An opportunity has arisen to fund the spread of communism in a neighboring state. If discovered
column2: this could start a diplomatic incident and gain us infamy... but if we do not act
column3: the workers around the world will continue to slave under bourgeois oppression. The proletariats in $CAPITAL$ are calling on us to aid the cause!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800061;An opportunity has arisen to fund the spread of fascism in a neighboring state. If discovered
column2: this could start a diplomatic incident and gain us infamy... but if we do not act
column3: we will be seen as shirking our duty to the fascist cause. The government elite in $CAPITAL$ are calling on us to aid the cause!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800062;An opportunity has arisen to fund the spread of anarcho-liberalism in a neighboring state. If discovered
column2: this could start a diplomatic incident and gain us infamy... but if we do not act
column3: we will be admitting that we cannot aid the spread of the bourgeois revolution. The liberal elite in $CAPITAL$ are calling on us to aid the cause!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800063;An opportunity has arisen to fund the spread of democracy in a neighboring state. If discovered
column2: this could start a diplomatic incident and gain us infamy... but if we do not act
column3: we will be seen as abandoning those who live under the rule of tyrants. Liberals in $CAPITAL$ are calling on us to aid the cause of world freedom!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800064; Several of our agents in $FROMCOUNTRY$ were discovered and interrogated
column2: and word of our efforts have spread. This will have an impact on our infamy
column3: and the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ may choose to take the issue as cause for war against us.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800065;We have reports of $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ propaganda being spread in one of our border provinces. Clearly the $FROMCOUNTRY$ government does not respect our sovereignty. Word of the event has leaked out
column2: and members of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government are calling for immediate action!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800066;If communism is to make strides in the modern era
column2: the ruling proletariat of every nation must work together towards a common goal. Towards that end
column3: $COUNTRY_ADJ$ leaders have called on the government to hold talks with a fellow communist nation to bring us closer together.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: offering to improve relations between our country and theirs. The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ leadership believes that nations so closely aligned in ideology should become closer in truth. Refusing their overtures could be seen as an insult.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800068;If communism is to make strides in the modern era
column2: the ruling proletariat of every nation must work together towards a common goal. Towards that end
column3: $COUNTRY_ADJ$ leaders have called on the government to hold talks with a fellow communist nation to bring us closer together.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800069;If fascism is to make strides in the modern era
column2: the rulers of every fascist nation must work together towards a common goal. Towards that end
column3: $COUNTRY_ADJ$ leaders have called on the government to hold talks with a fellow nation to bring us closer together.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800070;If fascism is to make strides in the modern era
column2: the rulers of every fascist nation must work together towards a common goal. Towards that end
column3: $COUNTRY_ADJ$ leaders have called on the government to hold talks with a fellow nation to bring us closer together.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800071;If anarcho-liberalism is to make strides in the modern era
column2: the rulers of every enlightened nation must work together towards a common goal. Towards that end
column3: $COUNTRY_ADJ$ leaders have called on the government to hold talks with a fellow anarcho-liberal nation to bring us closer together.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800072;If anarcho-liberalism is to make strides in the modern era
column2: the rulers of every enlightened nation must work together towards a common goal. Towards that end
column3: $COUNTRY_ADJ$ leaders have called on the government to hold talks with a fellow anarcho-liberal nation to bring us closer together.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800073;The threats to the modern world are many: communism
column2: fascism
column3: tyranny in all forms. If the free and democratic nations of the world are to survive
column4: they must stand together. $COUNTRY_ADJ$ leaders are calling on the government to initiate closer ties with a fellow democratic nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800074;The threats to the modern world are many: communism
column2: fascism
column3: tyranny in all forms. If the free and democratic nations of the world are to survive
column4: they must stand together. $COUNTRY_ADJ$ leaders are calling on the government to initiate closer ties with a fellow democratic nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800075;The time has come for the great communist powers of the world to stand together. A summit has been proposed in $CAPITAL$ that would bring our nations closer
column2: though it also has the chance of going badly and driving us further apart. Do we dare make the attempt?;;;;;;;;;;;;x
offering to hold a summit in their capital to bring our two great powers closer together. Refusing their overtures could be seen as an insult
column3: but it's also possible the summit could go poorly and make our relations worse rather than better.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800077;The summit in $CAPITAL$ was a smashing success! $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ diplomats left pleased with the progress
column2: and our relations have improved significantly.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800078;The summit in $CAPITAL$ unfortunately failed to make any significant progress. Talks with $FROMCOUNTRY$ stalled
column2: and even with our common ideological ground there are just too many issues remaining between our nations to improve relations more than marginally.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800079;The summit in $CAPITAL$ went very poorly. There are too many issues between our nations
column2: and $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ diplomats left in a huff. Our relations have suffered as a result.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800080;$FROMCOUNTRY$ has sent a polite refusal to our summit request
column2: saying now is not a good time for a summit.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800081;The time has come for the great fascist powers of the world to stand together. A summit has been proposed in $CAPITAL$ that would bring our nations closer
column2: though it also has the chance of going badly and driving us further apart. Do we dare make the attempt?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800082;The time has come for the great anarcho-liberal powers of the world to stand together. A summit has been proposed in $CAPITAL$ that would bring our nations closer
column2: though it also has the chance of going badly and driving us further apart. Do we dare make the attempt?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800083;The time has come for the great democratic powers of the world to stand together. A summit has been proposed in $CAPITAL$ that would bring our nations closer
column2: though it also has the chance of going badly and driving us further apart. Do we dare make the attempt?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800084;A violent incident has occurred at one of the foreign embassies in $CAPITAL$
column2: spurred on by resentment towards their nation and its ideological hostility towards our communist regime. We will need to decide now whether we are conciliatory in our response
column3: potentially losing prestige for the socialist movement
column4: or whether we imply that their nation's policies are what led to this unfortunate event.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800085;A violent incident has occurred at one of the foreign embassies in $CAPITAL$
column2: spurred on by resentment towards their nation and its ideological hostility towards our fascist regime. We will need to decide now whether we are conciliatory in our response
column3: potentially losing prestige for our nationalist movement
column4: or whether we imply that their nation's policies are what led to this unfortunate event.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800086;A violent incident has occurred at one of the foreign embassies in $CAPITAL$
column2: spurred on by resentment towards their nation and its ideological hostility towards our anarcho-liberal regime. We will need to decide now whether we are conciliatory in our response
column3: potentially losing prestige for our liberal movement
column4: or whether we imply that their nation's policies are what led to this unfortunate event.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800087;A violent incident has occurred at one of the foreign embassies in $CAPITAL$
column2: spurred on by resentment towards their nation and its ideological extremism. We will need to decide now whether we are conciliatory in our response
column3: potentially losing prestige for our nation and the cause of democracy in the world
column4: or whether we imply that their nation's policies are what led to this unfortunate event.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800088;A violent incident has occurred at one of the foreign embassies in $CAPITAL$
column2: spurred on by $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ resentment towards $COUNTRY$ and our ideology. Their response to the unfortunate event has thankfully been conciliatory
column3: and our government has received an official apology.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800089;A violent incident has occurred at our embassy in $FROMCOUNTRY$
column2: spurred on by $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ resentment towards $COUNTRY$ and our ideology. Their response has been insulting
column3: publicly blaming our policies even though their own careless disregard for the safety of our diplomats and their political upheaval is clearly at fault.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government has declared it is enraged by the incident and that our lack of control over our citizens is to blame. While they are seen as being unreasonably aggressive
column3: war is even a possibility.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800091;The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government has accepted our apology for the incident
column2: and while our relations have been damaged the incident has mostly blown over.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800092;$FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ leaders have declared our actions outrageous
column2: and that the incident was no doubt secretly supported by our government. They claim this provides them ample grounds for war.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800093;The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ has backed down from escalating the incident into a war. The entire business has harmed relations between our nations.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: an incident spurred on by differences between their country and our government's communist policies. It has severely harmed our relations.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
an incident spurred on by differences between their country and our government's fascist policies. It has severely harmed our relations.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
an incident spurred on by differences between their country and our government's anarcho-liberal policies. It has severely harmed our relations.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
an incident spurred on by differences between their country's radical ideology and our government's policies. It has severely harmed our relations.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800098;Several of our country's citizens have been attacked in the capital of $FROMCOUNTRY$
column2: an incident spurred on by the severe differences between our country's ideology and their's. The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ has been extremely reluctant to admit any involvement in the affair
column3: and our relations have been hurt as a result.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800100;We have been contacted by $COUNTRY_ADJ$ patriots
column2: currently living under the dominion of a neighboring country. They suggest that there is an opportunity to stir up sentiment among those living there so that they may rise up and rejoin the mother country. There is
column3: of course
column4: a risk that our efforts could be discovered and bring war down upon us. Should we help them?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800101;We have received reports that the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government has been inciting dissent among minorities in $COUNTRY$. This is an act of aggression that deserves a swift response.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC800102;Our efforts to incite $COUNTRY_ADJ$ patriots in $FROMCOUNTRY$ have been discovered. The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government is threatening war over this breach of their sovereignty.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC800147;The Indian subcontinent has been overwhelmed by the Sepoy rebels. Our garrisons are in retreat
column2: and our colonial governors have already fled for safer ports. We have no choice but to give into their demands
column3: many of which involve removing $COUNTRY_ADJ$ influence from any of the nations we have subjugated over the years of our rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAME800148;$FROMCOUNTRY$ Driven Out of South Asia;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC800148;The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ presence in South Asia has come to an end
column2: thanks to the spread of the Sepoy Rebellion. With $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ governors fleeing the subcontinent in droves
column3: our nation suddenly has a chance to regain lost lands and obtain our freedom ...whether we wish it or not.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800149;After a swarm of violence and looting that engulfed the entire nation
column2: $COUNTRY_ADJ$ rioters have stormed the capital. The government has been forced to make numerous concessions
column3: in a desperate bid to calm the people. So far it seems to have worked
column4: and has spared many leaders from being executed by angry mobs
column5: but it remains to be seen whether these concessions will only cause more problems in the end than they solved.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800150;Pan-nationalist rebels demanding a greater $UNION_ADJ$ union have taken over $CAPITAL$
column2: and have begun spreading the idea of $COUNTRY$ becoming part of $CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$ no matter the cost to $COUNTRY_ADJ$ sovereignty.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800151;$COUNTRY_ADJ$ patriots have risen up in a neighboring country
column2: and have gained sufficient control that they have sent word they wish to bring the province back to $COUNTRY$. Agreeing would mean risking war
column3: but refusing would mean angering our people.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC800152;With the patriot rebellion now over
column2: our provinces have now been brought under control and $COUNTRY_ADJ$ governors are once again in command.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC880130;Rumors were around for some time
column2: but a newspaper has finally published evidence of a wide-reaching scandal affecting the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ reactionary party. Aristocrats have allegedly been receiving payments and other illegal benefits for supporting the cause
column3: while the party leader is shown to have made a fortune with sensitive national information. This has been declared beyond the pale even by reactionary supporters and has caused a huge uproar within $COUNTRY$
column4: severely damaging the reactionary cause in $COUNTRY$.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC880140;Rumors were around for some time
column2: but a newspaper has finally published evidence of a wide-reaching scandal affecting the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ conservative party. Party leaders were allegedly paid secretly by local land owners to tweak laws in their favor
column3: governmental positions given to favorites
column4: goods stolen from  government warehouses - the list goes on and on. This has been declared beyond the pale even by conservative supporters and has caused a huge uproar within $COUNTRY$
column5: severely damaging the conservative cause in $COUNTRY$.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC880150;Rumors were around for some time
column2: but a newspaper has finally published evidence of a wide-reaching scandal affecting the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ liberal party. Popular candidates have allegedly been involved in smuggling of illicit goods
column3: used questionable tactics to buy votes and speculated on investments with government funds. This has been declared beyond the pale even by liberal supporters and has caused a huge uproar within $COUNTRY$
column4: severely damaging the liberal cause in $COUNTRY$.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC880160;Rumors were around for some time
column2: but a newspaper has finally published evidence of a wide-reaching scandal affecting the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ anarcho-liberal party. Several wealthy businessmen evaded taxes with the help of party members
column3: who in return received kickbacks and a great deal of illegal funding for the party. This has been declared beyond the pale even by anarcho-liberal supporters and has caused a huge uproar within $COUNTRY$
column4: severly damaging the anarcho-liberal cause in $COUNTRY$.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC880170;Rumors were around for some time
column2: but a newspaper has finally published evidence of a wide-reaching scandal affecting the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ socialist party. Illegal union activity
column3: blackmail of important citizens
column4: mistreatment of servants - the facts speak for themselves. This has been declared beyond the pale even by socialist supporters and has caused a huge uproar within $COUNTRY$
column5: severely hurting the socialist cause in $COUNTRY$.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC880180;Rumors were around for some time
column2: but a newspaper has finally published evidence of a wide-reaching scandal affecting the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ communist party. While preaching water for the masses
column3: important communist party officals appear to drink wine. Police has secured several party coffers filled with dirty money from illegal activities
column4: stolen art and conterfeit documents. This has been declared beyond the pale even by communist supporters
column5: severely hurting the communist cause in $COUNTRY$.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC880190;Rumors were around for some time
column2: but a newspaper has finally published evidence of a wide-reaching scandal affecting the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ fascist party. A militant group associated with the fascists was revealed to have murdered several socialist politicians
column3: tortured priests and attempted to burn the mansion of a wealthy minority leader. This has been declared beyond the pale even by fascist supporters and has caused a huge uproar within $COUNTRY$
column4: severly damaging the fascist cause.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC880200;As more and more evidence against the ruling party has come to light
column2: the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government has declared it has no choice but to resign and call an election. The decision was made after several weeks of heated debate
column3: and it is already well-known that certain members of the government-- those most sorely hit by the scandal-- have been repudiated by the ruling party and will not be seeking re-election. How this will affect the government's chances is so far unknown.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC880210;Investigation of the current party scandal by the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ press has brought to light a number of interesting facts. It seems that abuse of power and influence goes well beyond what was initially revealed. Only the surface of this affair has been touched so far
column2: and God only knows what might turn up within the next few weeks. No-one in $COUNTRY$ appears to be discussing anything else at the moment
column3: and already there are calls in the press for the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government to step down.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC999000;The intensive election campaign has reached the boiling point in $COUNTRY$
column2: where a fierce trade policy debate pits the friends of free trade against the pals of protectionism in a rough rumble-and-tumble to determine the future of our nation's traders. Free-traders argue that goods must be allowed to freely cross all borders
column3: while protectionists argue that our nation's fragile industries need protection from dangerous foreign competition threatening to undo them. Which path will $COUNTRY$ tread
column4: as it decides on: Free trade
column5: or Protectionism?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999000;Our trade must be protected from destructive foreign competition!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999000;Let the debate take its own course
column2: and let the chips fall where they may!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTC999000;Freedom of trade shall not perish from this Earth!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999001;The debate had been going on for several hours
column2: when a candidate stepped forward and presented arguments for their cause which silenced all opponents.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC999002;'The morality and virtue of our people have started to decline!' This statement caused much stir among the debaters of toleration and religious plurality. They have started to question the country's view on religion.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999002;Religion is not a political issue!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC999002;Let the people have their faith.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTD999002;There is one faith and one faith only!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999003;Two debaters are arguing heatedly about their views. The rest of the hall sits dumbfounded when words like aliens
column2: minorities
column3: ethnic and cultural groups are thrown between the two. One wish that immigrants should adapt to the dominant culture while the other believes that they should retain their cultural heritage.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTB999003;We need to limit their citizenship.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999004;Patriots and pacifists are fighting in the townhouse
column2: using words to hurt and kill their enemies. A long since dead and buried dispute between $COUNTRY$ and its neighbor has once again shown its ugly head. Patriots wish to invade the country while pacifists believe that there are other ways to resolve the dispute.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999004;We are patriots and we are going to fight for our country!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: but in this situation it would be meaningless.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTC999004;War between countries is never good.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTD999004;This can be solved without violence.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999010;The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ political parties have begun a nationwide election campaign. So far
column2: the effects have been quite limited
column3: but in the end
column4: one party will gain the upper hand. Advisors state that we could try to influence the outcome ourselves.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTD999010;Let the campaigns take their course and do not intervene.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999020;The remaining election campaign of $YEAR$ has been unusually quiet. The political parties have had no pressing issues which have gripped the country's attention
column2: and the election seems to be passing without any national debates or events.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999020;There shall be peace and quite in our time.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999021;The election campaign of $YEAR$ has been unusually violent. Only a few days after the campaign had begun
column2: the first incidents started. Strikes occured in several large factories
column3: with incidents of streetfighting in most major cities. Paramilitary groups have threatened voters of opposing ideologies
column4: while radicals have staged attacks on political enemies. The $COUNTRY_ADJ$ police are tirelessly to get the situation under control
column5: but it looks as if $COUNTRY$ is in for a contentious election.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC999022;The tensions from the current election campaign have escalated
column2: with disorder spreading fast in $CAPITAL$ and spreading elsewhere. Advisors are recommending that the military be brought into the capital to restore order
column3: though doing so will only contain the violence at best.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999022;Send in the army. Order must be restored.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999022;Let the riots play their course.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC999030;It looks like the socialists have a talent in the current election to find the right words when and where they are needed: All over $COUNTRY$ their new agenda has persuaded a lot of people to join their cause.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA999030;We will have an eye on this.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999031;It looks like the communists have a talent in the current election to find the right words when and where they are needed: All over $COUNTRY$
column2: their new agenda has persuaded a lot of people to join their cause.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999031;We will have an eye on this.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999032;It looks like the fascists have a talent in the current election to find the right words when and where they are needed: All over$COUNTRY$
column2: their new agenda has persuaded a lot of people to join their cause.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999032;We will have an eye on this.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

EVTDESC999033;It looks like the liberals have a talent in the current election to find the right words when and where they are needed: All over $COUNTRY$ their new agenda has persuaded a lot of people to join their cause.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999034;It looks like the anarcho liberals
column2: a group of radicals who have taken the liberal ideals to their extreme
column3: have discovered a talent in the current election to find the right words when and where they are needed: All over $COUNTRY$ their new agenda has persuaded a lot of people to join their cause.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC999035;A new breed of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ liberals has become very active in the current election-- educated liberals who believe equally in both social and political reform. They have been actively campaigning for people to support both
column2: and have been attracting a lot of attention.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC999036;There are a large number of people
column2: particularly among the ruling elite of $COUNTRY$
column3: who believe that liberal attitudes have been responsible for all of the country's ills. They advocate controls on immigration and a repeal of voting rights. They also appear to have charismatic speakers
column4: for they seem to be gathering a lot of attention in the current election.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC999037;It looks like the conservatives have discovered a talent in the current election to find the right words when and where they are needed: All over $COUNTRY$ their agenda has persuaded a lot of people to join their cause.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999040;'Why should only the rich be allowed to vote? We also pay taxes
column2: so why shouldn't we have something to say in politics?' \n\nThe industrial revolution has empowered the middle class. More and more businessmen are making more and more money. It seems only natural that they demand voting rights.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA999040;They are right - support their reform.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB999040;Voting rights for the middle class? Nay!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC999040;A reform is long past due - issue a new voting right.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we even pay way higher taxes then they do! Still
column3: their votes are worth more than ours - I ask you: is that really fair?' \n\nWhile being allowed to vote
column4: the middle class feels diminished by the current weighted voting rights
column5: and the subject has been repeatedly raised in the current election.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTC999041;We shall do this right away!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999042;'Why is everyone trying to keep us out of politics? Because we are uneducated? They call us minors
column2: but that is a lie! Our sweet and toil has brought the nation forward! We have waited long enough - now we demand our just due!' \n\nThe subject of voting rights for the poor has been repeatedly raised in the current election.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC999043;'We hold these truths to be self-evident
column2: that all men are created equal
column3: that they are endowed by their Creator with certain unalienable Rights
column4: that among these are Life
column5: Liberty
column6: and the Pursuit of Happiness. That to secure these rights
column7: Governments are instituted among Men
column8: deriving their just powers from the consent of the governed' \n - Thomas Jefferson;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTB999043;Enough is enough! Stop that nonsense!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC999043;Equal votes for equal chances - NOW!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: again and again. Why? Because I am a proud citizen who will speak the truth! I don't believe that the ruling party will save us. And my weapon is logic
column3: but theirs is the stick.'\n\nThe issue of political party harassment has been repeatedly raised in the current election.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTB999044;There is no need to change the system.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999045;'Why are they allowed to change the rules during an election? Drawing random borders to scatter those who won't vote for them is not fair. It is fraud
column2: I tell you! They divided our district between four others
column3: because they knew how we would vote. FRAUD! That's what it is
column4: I tell you!'\n\nThe issue of voter district gerrymandering has been repeatedly raised in the current election.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we have to do something.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTB999045;Want me to play the world's smallest violin?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999046;'Why does everyone stare at me when I make my vote? Do they really need to know? It is not like I am committing a crime or something
column2: I simply want to vote in peace. Without having half of the polling station looking at me

column1: EVTOPTA999046;I guess some privacy would be in order.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: but liberals and socialists are still arguing about the current state of affairs. Unemployment is a problem
column3: but both sides have decisive arguments for what they think has to be done.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTC999049;Do not get involved in the debate.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999050;Unemployment is still an important issue in $COUNTRY$
column2: but all our recent attempts to crate new jobs have failed. During the election of $YEAR$
column3: communists and fascists argued that their dogma is the only one that will give work to the people.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTC999050;Social reform can be achieved without radicalism.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTD999049;Do not get involved in the debate.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC999055;A recent mine accident that led to the deaths of five children
column2: all labourers working under the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ child labor laws
column3: has led to a national debate over the issue. Children wearing protest signs have shown up at political debates
column4: causing quite a stir and raising the question over whether the government should consider reform.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: denouncing the fact that 'universal suffrage' in $COUNTRY$ does not include them
column3: has drawn attention throughout the country and sparked debates over whether minorities should be given the right to vote. Reactionaries are incensed at the idea
column4: claiming that only 'true' $COUNTRY_ADJ$ citizens should decide its government.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC999057;Immigration has long been a thorny issue in $COUNTRY$
column2: with many citizens maintaining the opinion that allowing too many foreigners into the country leads to chaos and unemployment. $COUNTRY$ should be for the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people
column3: and no others. Despite this
column4: the plight of immigrants who are longing to be reunited with family currently located elsewhere has received a great deal of attention in the current election. There have been demonstrations by liberals in $CAPITAL$ calling for immigration reform.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC999060;So far the war has dominated talk in the election
column2: with a number of jingoistic politicians rousing the people with fiery speeches. 'We must protect $COUNTRY$!'
column3: they cry. '$COUNTRY$ must be mighty!' It seems they are being listened to
column4: as so far they have enjoyed success throughout the country.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC999061;While $COUNTRY$ is not currently at war
column2: there are those who think it should be. 'They are ripe for the picking
column3: and $COUNTRY$ must strike now! While we are strong!' They are referring to one of our hated neighbours
column4: who some jingoists feel should be a target for expansion. Permitting such talk will make us look aggressive to the international community
column5: however
column6: though it may also be an opportunity of which to take advantage.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC999065;A recent incident involving the death of several slaves at the hands of their owner has gained national attention in the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ election
column2: with both sides pouncing on the debate. Abolitionists say that this is but one more example of slavery being responsible for the inhumane treatment of one's fellow man. Proponents claim this is a matter for the courts to resolve
column3: and accuse the Abolitionists of stirring up an isolated incident.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: British committees have looked into the situation in Ireland and predicted disaster: the Irish farmers had become more and more dependent on their potato crop
column3: and if anything were to happen to that crop it would cause not only widespread chaos throughout the Irish economy but famine and worse. Their predictions have come true. A blight has been spreading
