column4: leading to failure after failure of the Irish potato harvest. Proponents of laissez faire economics are adamant that the market will provide food for those affected
column5: and that the government should not interfere in private enterprise. Others claim that no expense is too high to help the Irish
column6: and that failure to act quickly will lead to starvation and resentment... but conservatives are quick to dismiss this as inflammatory nonsense.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1010012;The blight affecting the Irish potato crop has spread to $STATENAME$. With the local harvest quickly failing
column2: the effects are already being felt-- poor Irish peasants are walking the streets of $PROVINCENAME$
column3: begging for government aid which never arrives
column4: and many are obviously considering making their way to the New World out of desperation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1010013;The blight affecting the Irish potato crop has spread to $STATENAME$. With the local harvest quickly failing
column2: the effects are already being felt-- poor Irish peasants are walking the streets of $PROVINCENAME$
column3: barely subsisting on the limited cornmeal handouts offered by the government
column4: and many are obviously considering making their way to the New World out of desperation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1010014;The blight affecting the Irish potato crop has spread to $STATENAME$. With the local harvest quickly failing
column2: the effects are already being felt--in $PROVINCENAME$
column3: the Irish are gathering in large crowds to receive aid sent by the British government. While they are grateful
column4: times are still incredibly difficult and it's clear many are considering leaving Ireland to take their chances in the New World.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1010015;An aborted attempt at an uprising recently took place in the village of Ballingarry
column2: Ireland. A group of Irish nationalists
column3: frustrated by what they call the inept handling of the recent famine by the British government
column4: engaged in a long gunfight with a unit of constabulary until reinforcements arrived and drove the men off. Many of these nationalists have since been captured and tried
column5: but the event has sparked an increase in nationalism across the island.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1010016;Not content to wait until the dust of the war has settled
column2: nationalists in Ireland have taken to the streets of $PROVINCENAME$ to call for the end of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ rule. With our forces engaged elsewhere
column3: their calls have quickly swept across all of $STATENAME$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1010020;The tone among the people in our Irish territories has changed. Many Irish nationalist who emigrated to the United States founded a militant organization called the Fenian Brotherhood there
column2: a group dedicated to freeing Ireland from $COUNTRY_ADJ$ control... and now they have formed a sister organization back home
column3: the Irish Republican Brotherhood. Already they are stirring up trouble
column4: and it seems certain they will continue until some manner of home rule is attained.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1010021;We've received reports that the Irish Republican Brotherhood has been active in $PROVINCENAME$
column2: spreading propaganda and generally stirring up agitation against the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government. The constabulary in $STATENAME$ has been actively hunting these nationalists down
column3: but considering many within the constabulary are Irish themselves the process has not been simple.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1010022;The Irish Republican Brotherhood has stirred up local resentment in $PROVINCENAME$
column2: resulting in several riots and a renewed campaign against $COUNTRY_ADJ$ rule in Ireland.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1010023;In an event organized by the Irish Republican Brotherhood
column2: a group of Irish nationalists seized key locations in the city of $PROVINCENAME$ on Easter Monday
column3: kicking off the most significant uprising in Ireland since the rebellion of 1798.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1010024;Spurred on by increased public sympathy towards the Irish Republican Brotherhood following the Easter Rising
column2: the Sinn Féin have won a majority of seats in Ireland during the last election. They have gathered in Dublin and declared themselves Dáil Éireann
column3: the parliament of Ireland
column4: and demanded that Ireland be granted immediate full independence. Considering their popularity
column5: refusing would all but certainly trigger a war... but many agree that this is not the way to a peaceful resolution
column6: and that $COUNTRY$ should never submit to such demands.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1010025;With Ireland once again under our control
column2: talks have begun in earnest to deal with the Irish situation once and for all... now on our terms
column3: rather than on theirs. The suggestion is that Ireland remain an autonomous Dominion under our control
column4: with any regions that wish to opt out of the new state and remain part of $COUNTRY$ able to do so. Others suggest this is unworkable
column5: and we should either simply release them and keep them as allies or annex them entirely.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1010030;An Anglo-Irish politician by the name of Charles Stewart Parnell has just been elected to Parliament. Some are describing him as a firebrand and nationalist agitator
column2: while others suggest he's a man of remarkable charisma and organizational talent-- able to take on the entirety of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ political system in order to push his Irish Home Rule agenda and succeed. It's very possible that this man could single-handedly turn the tide of opinion on the subject of Home Rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1010031;With Charles Stewart Parnell putting forward his Home Rule agenda
column2: $COUNTRY_ADJ$ citizens in $PROVINCENAME$ have become increasingly concerned that they might end up in an independent Irish state-- one dominated by Irish catholics in Dublin. They have begun actively campaigning to ensure this doesn't happen.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1010032;Charles Stewart Parnell has been successfully advancing his Home Rule Bill through Parliament
column2: and while it is continually being held up by opposition from the Upper House
column3: there is a sense that the man is managing to convince $COUNTRY_ADJ$ law-makers who-- in the not-too-distant past-- might have said that Home Rule was unthinkable./n/nNow we must consider whether his vision will see the light of day: do we grant Ireland the status of an autonomous Dominion under our control
column4: or put this aside and face renewed violence among the Irish? Either way
column5: this man Parnell will not desist, and the question will keep coming before us even if we do not pass the Bill now.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC1010033;The revelation that Charles Stewart Parnell has been involved with a married woman
column2: one Catherine O'Shea
column3: and indeed is responsible for her subsequent divorce
column4: was the scandal that ended his political career and prevented him from pushing the Home Rule agenda. Without him
column5: it appears unlikely that the Irish Republican movement will gain the political clout it requires to attempt another passing of the Home Rule Bill.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the fascists have taken power in the government. Technically they are allowed to do so
column3: and their party has not been banned. There are concerns
column4: however
column5: that their ultimate goal is to take over the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government and that this election win is just the first step in doing so. Some are even suggesting the possibility of voter fraud. Regardless
column6: the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people have spoken... and the monarchy must decide whether to intervene and refuse the fascists their mandate as many expect. Failure to intervene means admitting that they have no power and thus relinquishing all control over the government.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the communists have taken power in the government. Technically they are allowed to do so
column3: and their party has not been banned. There are concerns
column4: however
column5: that their ultimate goal is to take over the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government and that this election win is just the first step in doing so. Some are even suggesting the possibility of voter fraud. Regardless
column6: the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people have spoken... and the monarchy must decide whether to intervene and refuse the communists their mandate as many expect. Failure to intervene means admitting that they have no power and thus relinquishing all control over the government.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the anarcho-liberals have taken power in the government. Technically they are allowed to do so
column3: and their party has not been banned. There are concerns
column4: however
column5: that their ultimate goal is to take over the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government and that this election win is just the first step in doing so. Some are even suggesting the possibility of voter fraud. Regardless
column6: the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people have spoken... and the monarchy must decide whether to intervene and refuse these radical republicans their mandate as many expect. Failure to intervene means admitting that they have no power and thus relinquishing all control over the government.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the communists have taken power in the government-- despite the fact that their party opposes the monarchy and has been banned. Regardless
column3: the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people have spoken
column4: and thus a political showdown has resulted: the communists cannot be permitted to win
column5: but even if they're refused the next election might simply have the same crisis occur all over again. Perhaps the time has come to reconsider electoral reforms and put the power back where it belongs?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the anarcho-liberals have taken power in the government-- despite the fact that their party opposes the monarchy and has been banned. Regardless
column3: the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people have spoken
column4: and thus a political showdown has resulted: these radical republicans cannot be permitted to win
column5: but even if they're refused the next election might simply have the same crisis occur all over again. Perhaps the time has come to reconsider electoral reforms and put the power back where it belongs?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC152009872;There is unrest among $COUNTRY_ADJ$ officers in the military
column2: enough that some of them are actively spreading dissension among the ranks. $COUNTRY$ would be better served
column3: they say
column4: if the army was in charge rather than the current leadership-- elected it may be
column5: but according to them it has proven too ineffective. And it seems many of the men under their command agree.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC152009873;$COUNTRY_ADJ$ army forces in $CAPITAL$ have made their way toward the government buildings-- not to protect the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government as is their duty
column2: but instead to oust our leaders and install themselves as $COUNTRY$'s new rulers. They claim that $COUNTRY$ is in a state of 'upheaval'
column3: and only the army can restore order.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reform_CSA_desc;If the North will not stand for truth and justice
column2: then the South shall rise and take its place!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: join_new_CSA_desc;The people have called on us to unite under the new Confederate banner. Long live the South!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_FSA_title;Form the Free States of America;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_FSA_desc;If the USA will not stand for truth and justice
column2: then the FSA shall rise and take its place!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: join_FSA_desc;The people have called on us to unite under the new FSA banner. Long live the Sons of Liberty!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_california_desc;The people have called on us to unite under the California banner. Long live the Sons of Liberty!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_new_america_desc;The people have called on us to unite under the New America banner. Long live the Sons of Liberty!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
rejoin_usa_desc;With the American government restored to democracy
column2: our people have decided it is time to rejoin the Union. Let the United States be restored to the destiny it was meant for!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: exile_house_of_saud_desc;We are victorious over the House of Saud. We must send them into exile
column2: so that Arabia stands united under a single flag: our own.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: exile_house_of_rashid_desc;We are victorious over the House of Rashid. We must send them into exile
column2: so that Arabia stands united under a single flag: our own.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_nejd_desc;We cannot unite all of Arabia under our banner unless we control the central provinces. The House of Rashid must stand dominant!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_hail_desc;We cannot unite all of Arabia under our banner unless we control the northern provinces. The House of Saud must stand dominant!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_hedjaz_NEJ_desc;We must claim the western lands in Hedjaz if we are to unite all of Arabia under our rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_hedjaz_HAL_desc;We must claim the western lands in Hedjaz if we are to unite all of Arabia under our rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_arabia_HDJ_desc;We must claim the eastern lands in Nejd and Hail if we are to unite all of Arabia under our rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_arabia_ASR_desc;We must claim the rest of the peninsula if we are to unite all of Arabia under our rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_arabian_peninsula_desc;We must unite all of the Arabian peninsula under our rule
column2: including all of the Trucial States
column3: Oman

column1: become_saudi_arabia_desc;We must reunite Nejd and Hedjaz under a single flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_saudi_arabia_desc;A united arab nation under our rule will make a strong and stable ally.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

encourage_arab_nationalism_desc;The way to truly fight the Ottoman Empire is to dismantle it from within. We must encourage their Arab minorities to rise up and seek their own destiny as independent nations.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
ibn_saud_desc;The time has come to unite all of the Arabian peninsula under our rule. Hedjaz must be taken
column2: in order for the Saudi nation to truly stand on its own.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_holy_city_desc;Mecca is the center of all Islam. To hold it is to stand above all others
column2: and prove to them that the fate of all Islam lies in our hands.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: hedjaz_independent_desc;It is clear that Egypt is no longer in a position to rule us. Thus it is time for the Hedjaz to find its own path.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: Queen Isabella II decreed the establishment of a free public shool system in the Philippines that used Spanish as the language of instruction
column3: leading to an increasing number of educated Filipinos. This would be the first in a number of colonial initiatives that rendered the Philippines as one of the few places in the world where it was said to have visibly improved and prospered under colonial rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_paris_1898_desc;Spain has no choice but to admit it cannot hold onto its Caribbean and Pacific holdings. If we sit down and enter into peace negotiations with the Spanish government
column2: it is possible they might be willing to end this war and turn over their holdings to us… for a price. Some will see this as the beginnings of American colonialism
column3: but to our government this is simply a recognition of the world power that the United States has become.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_paris_1898_victory_desc;We have been victorious in our war against Spain
column2: and Cuba is now free. The Spanish government should realize it does not have the power to hold onto its North American and Pacific colonies. We should approach them and demand they turn over these colonies to us-- for
column3: while it might indicate to some the beginnings of American colonialism
column4: we feel these colonies are best entrusted to the care of a democratic Western power who has the power to hold them.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: moret_law_desc;The Moret Law granted freedom to slaves in Puerto Rico born after 1868
column2: slaves who served in the Spanish Army
column3: slaves over 60 years old
column4: and slaves who were owned by the Spanish government. It was the first in a series of reforms that saw slavery ended in Peurto Rico
column5: well before it was ended in other Spanish colonies.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_indonesia_desc;We must unite all of the Malay
column2: Javan
column3: Moluccan and Melanesian people of the East Indies under a common banner. Down with the imperialists!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: sarawak_protectorate_desc;The so-called 'White Rajah' dynasty of Sarawak has held close ties with England since its creation
column2: and now the possibility of peacefully establishing a protectorate over this kingdom in the East Indies has arisen.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: sulu_protectorate_desc;The Sultanate of Sulu has held close ties with Spain for many years
column2: and now the possibility of peacefully establishing a protectorate over this country in the East Indies has arisen.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_lan_na_desc;The Kingdom of Lan Na must unite with Siam
column2: for the benefit of both our nations in resisting imperialist control.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: flores_sale_desc;The Indonesian islands are almost worthless to us
column2: but might be of value to the Dutch East India Company. We should consider selling them for a tidy profit.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: end_of_the_UK_title;The end of the United Kingdom;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_the_UK_desc;With both Scotland and Ireland gone
column2: this Kingdom can't be called 'United' anymore. Long live England!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_mayan_lands_desc;The time has come for the Mayan people to reclaim what they have lost!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_santa_catarina_desc;Our fellow rebels in the neighboring province of Santa Catarina must be liberated. The Juliana Republic must be freed from Brazilian rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_greater_albania_desc;The lands of ethnic Albanians must be reunited with the motherland
column2: no matter where they might live.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_mongolia_desc;The lands of ethnic Mongolians must be reunited with the motherland
column2: no matter where they might live.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_tatar_lands_desc;Now that the Tatars are strong once again
column2: we must reclaim the historical lands of Tartary!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: inherit_ryukyu_desc;The islands of Ryukyu have always had blood ties to both China and Japan. They must be brought into the fold with the rest of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
ryukyu_is_japanese_desc;The islands that were once Ryukyu are rightfully Japanese territory. We must establish our claim to them!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_afghanistan_desc;We are a power to be reckoned with. It is time that we claimed the lands that are part of our heritage!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_nepal_desc;The time has come to revoke the Sugauli Treaty and take back that which was taken from us. Greater Nepal must be restored!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_serbia_desc;Many Serbs live throughout the Balkans. It is our duty to unite all of them under the Serbian flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reclaim_croatia_desc;The Croatians renounced their ties to Hungary during the revolution
column2: but now the time has come to reclaim our ancient kingdom's western shores.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_ukraine_desc;All Ukrainians must rightfully fall under the Ukrainian flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_macedonia_desc;All Macedonians must rightfully fall under the Macedonian flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_with_ukraine_desc;For the common good of our people
column2: we must set aside our sovereignty and join the greater Ukrainian nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_poland_desc;Poland must be reborn! With Warsaw back in our hands
column2: we must take the first step towards uniting all Polish people under a common flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_poland_desc;Now that Poland has been reborn
column2: the time has come for Krakow to rejoin the motherland.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: krakow_form_galicia_desc;Now that we have liberated Galicia from foreign tyranny
column2: let us extend to its people the freedoms we ourselves hold dear. Long live free Galicia!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we should break free from the southern dominance and show who is the real power in the Andes!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_new_pbc_desc;Now we are a greater power
column2: we can unite again with our South-Andean brothers and sisters.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_confederation_PEU_desc;As Peru is not connected to Bolivia anymore
column2: the Confederacy can be declared extinct.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_confederation_SPU_desc;As South Peru is not connected to Bolivia anymore
column2: the Confederacy can be declared extinct.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_confederation_BOL_desc;As Bolivia is not connected to Peru anymore
column2: the Confederacy can be declared extinct.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_la_paz_desc;Our claim to both Peru and Bolivia is now considered legitimate.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
centralizer_act_huayna_capac_desc;As the central government grows stronger
column2: the Confederation becomes more and more an unitary state. The 'Centralizer Act Huayna Capac' concentrates even more power in the president and creates the United Republic of Peru-Bolivia.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_new_pbc_desc;Now we are a greater power
column2: we can unite again with our South-Andean brothers and sisters.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we stand in a position to resume control over South Peru and unite the nation once more.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: organize_angola_desc;Angola is becoming a true Portuguese colony. We must create the proper colonial structures
column2: so that it stands on par with our European provinces.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: organize_mozambique_desc;Mozambique is becoming a true Portuguese colony. We must create the proper colonial structures
column2: so that it stands on par with our European provinces.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_simulambuko_desc;With the colonial powers of Europe having met at the Congo Conference to decide the orderly division of the African continent
column2: pressure is mounting for Portugal to occupy the lands we have lain claim to. Our diplomats have been in close contact with the princes of Cabinda
column3: and with additional urging we should be able to conclude a treaty forcing the Kongolese to surrender our Angolan claims.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_uzbekistan_khiva_desc;We must unite the Uzbeks into a single state
column2: with sovereignty over all our ancestral land. Under Uzbek leadership
column3: all of Turkestan will one day be united!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_uzbekistan_bukkhara_desc;We must unite the Uzbeks into a single state
column2: with sovereignty over all our ancestral land. Under Uzbek leadership
column3: all of Turkestan will one day be united!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_kyrgyzstan_desc;We must unite the Kyrgyz into a single and modern state
column2: with sovereignty over all our ancestral land. Under Kyrgyz leadership
column3: all of Turkestan will one day be united!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Turkmen
column3: Kyrgyz
column4: Tajiks and Uzbeks can at last be united into a single Turkestan. Should this dream ever come to pass
column5: the world shall tremble before our might!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_yugoslavia_desc;The Slavic peoples of the Balkans must be united under a single banner: ours. It is the only way to keep us free of rule from European powers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_serbia_desc;The Slavic union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_croatia_desc;The Slavic union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_slovenia_desc;The Slavic union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_bosnia_desc;The Slavic union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_albania_desc;The Slavic union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_yugoslavia_montenegro_desc;The Slavic union has been sundered. It is time to bring it to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_czechoslovakia_desc;Bohemia and Slovakia cannot exist alone amidst the warring powers of Europe. We must unite under a single banner!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_czechoslovakia_bohemia_desc;The union of Bohemia and Slovakia has been sundered. It is time to bring Czechoslovakia to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_czechoslovakia_slovakia_desc;The union of Bohemia and Slovakia has been sundered. It is time to bring Czechoslovakia to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_moldavia_wallachia_desc;The Principalities of Moldavia and Wallachia must unite under a single flag
column2: and together achieve our destiny as a united Romania!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_romania_desc;Now that Romania has been formed
column2: the time has come for us to join the motherland.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_romania_desc;A united and free Romania will make a formidable and valuable ally.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
provincia_cisplatina_desc;The Provincia Cisplatina was brazilian once
column2: and shall be brazilian again!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: rio_da_prata_desc;As the Parana river is the natural southern border of Brazil
column2: it's natural for such a great country to conquer Entre-Rios.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: banda_oriental_desc;The Banda Oriental del Uruguay was argentinean once
column2: and shall be argentinean again!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the Gauchos;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: our_brothers_the_gauchos_desc;It's time to free our brothers
column2: the Gauchos
column3: from the brazilian rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: gran_colombia_by_sword_desc;If Gran Colombia is to exist once again
column2: we must lay claim to all its territory-- and reunite it by sword

column1: unite_gran_colombia_desc;Gran Colombia shall be reborn from the ashes. Long live the united republic!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_austria_desc;The time has come to end the dual monarchy and return to our Austrian heritage.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_hungarian_revolution_desc;There is no hope for us to continue. Our revolutionaries stand defeated and our country occupied-- we must submit!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
release_galicia_desc;With our holdings in Galicia-Lodomeria cut off from the rest of Austria
column2: it only makes sense that we give the locals more autonomy. Let the Polish raise their own armies-- so long as they do so in the service of the Austrian crown.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: release_bukovina_desc;With our holdings in Bukovina cut off from the rest of Austria
column2: it only makes sense that we give the locals more autonomy. Let the Romanians raise their own armies-- so long as they do so in the service of the Austrian crown.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: bosnian_annexation_desc;The government feels it is vital to bring Bosnia more fully under our administration
column2: despite the international furore it might cause.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: abandon_neutral_faction_desc;We can no longer afford to stand on the sidelines in the civil war. For better or worse
column2: we must recognize that we have already cast the die in the conflict and take a stand.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: abandon_kuomintang_faction_desc;The goals of the Kuomintang are no longer our own. As our ideology has changed
column2: so must our allegiance. The civil war continues!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: abandon_communist_faction_desc;The goals of the Communists are no longer our own. As our ideology has changed
column2: so must our allegiance. The civil war continues!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: abandon_beiyang_faction_desc;The goals of the Beiyang Army are no longer our own. As our ideology has changed
column2: so must our allegiance. The civil war continues!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_leader_of_kuomintang_desc;It falls to us to take the mantle of Kuomintang leadership. Victory for Nationalist China!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we may assume leadership over the Beiyang government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we are in a position to aid the cause of Nationalist China. We must join our forces with theirs
column3: for the good of all!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unequal_treaty_desc;The Qing Empire is at a disadvantage. We are in a position to bring them to the negotiating table
column2: and wrangle concessions of both land and reparations-- provided they are willing

column1: unequal_treaty_TPG_desc;The Heavenly Kingdom is at a disadvantage. We are in a position to bring them to the negotiating table
column2: and wrangle concessions of both land and reparations-- provided they are willing

column1: total_war_in_taiping_desc;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_peking_desc;The Taiping Rebellion threatens the dynasty and
column2: indeed
column3: the entire Empire. We must call on all our citizens to rise up and fight against these Christian infidels!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_kashgaria_desc;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_yunnan_desc;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_rio_grande_sul_title;Total War in Rio Grande do Sul;;;;;;;;;;;;x
total_war_in_rio_grande_sul_desc;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_rio_grande_desc;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_yucatan_desc;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_hindustan_desc;We must unite the people of Hindustan under a single flag
column2: to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_marathas_desc;The Maratha Empire was once the greatest force upon the Indian subcontinent. The time has come for it to rise once more!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_dravidistan_desc;We must unite the Dravidian people under a single flag
column2: to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_rajputana_desc;We must unite the Rajput people under a single flag
column2: to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_rajputana_outside_desc;The Rajput states must be collected into a single state
column2: one which will far better serve our needs as a stronger ally.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_baluchistan_desc;The Baluchi people must be liberated and united under a single flag-- ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_durrani_empire_desc;With Pashtun lands once again back in our hands
column2: the empire of the Pashtuns can once again rise and reclaim that which was lost!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_bengal_desc;The Bengal Empire once ruled over much of eastern India
column2: and the time has come to once again restake our claim. We must strike a blow against the forces of imperialism!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: PNJ_embrace_pashtun_minority_desc;The Sikh Empire is a secular
column2: tolerant state. We shall embrace the Pashtun lands under our dominion
column3: and together forge a nation even stronger than before.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: PNJ_embrace_sindi_minority_desc;The Sikh Empire is a secular
column2: tolerant state. We shall embrace the Sindi lands under our dominion
column3: and together forge a nation even stronger than before.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: PNJ_embrace_avadhi_minority_desc;The Sikh Empire is a secular
column2: tolerant state. We shall embrace the Avadhi lands under our dominion
column3: and together forge a nation even stronger than before.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: rangit_singh_desc;The Maharajah Ranjit Singh has united the Panjabi misls under a single flag. He has formed a secular and tolerant state
column2: one that has thrown off the Afghan yoke and resisted the encroaching imperialists. The future of the Sikh Empire is bright!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_nepal_desc;The time has come to rejoin with Greater Nepal and reform the great eastern kingdom.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Russians have maintained sovereign authority over Christians in the Holy Land-- authority that rightfully belongs to the Roman Catholic Church. It is time for that to change.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_paris_1856_desc;With the Russians having failed to assert their authority over the Turks
column2: it is time for the powers of Europe to convene in Paris and settle the matter as best we can.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_paris_russia_desc;Now that we have successfully asserted our authority over the Turks
column2: it is time to convene the powers of Europe in Paris and settle the matter as best we can.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: protect_eastern_christians_desc;If we are to retain our status as the defenders of eastern Christians
column2: we must act now and make war upon the Turks and her allies. We will not be denied!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: conquest_of_the_desert_desc;A proposal has been brought forth to finally push into the southern Patagonian lands and pacify them once and for all. Argentina must make its claim so none can deny us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

occupation_of_araucania_desc;A proposal has been brought forth to finally push into the southern lands of Araucania and pacify them once and for all. Chile must make its claim so none can deny us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
argentina_chile_border_treaty_desc;Now that the lands of Araucania and Patagonia are fully settled
column2: it might be prudent for us to approach the Chileans and see if we cannot agree on a border-- they would get the lands west of the Andes and we the lands to the east. If we cannot come to an agreement
column3: there is likely to be war.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: entre_rios_independent_desc;General Francisco Ramírez has issued a call to the people of Argentina: rise up
column2: and force the dictators to agree to a just constitution that provides rights to every Argentine citizen!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_china_desc;With the northern capital now under our control
column2: the time has come to unite all of China under a single flag.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_holstein_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Holstein is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_schleswig_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Schleswig is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: appeal_to_the_british_desc;Though we are loathe to do so
column2: it appears we are left with little choice: we must appeal to the British for protection
column3: lest we fall under foreign rule and lose what little we have left.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_xhosa_lands_desc;The Xhosa lands rightfully belong to the Cape Colony
column2: and the colonial governor has made a formal request to the British government to adminster the lands to protect colonist safety along the border.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: begin_crimean_war_desc;The Ottoman breach of our treaty protecting eastern Christians in the Levant cannot be abided. We must act
column2: or face the loss of both prestige and the confidence of Orthodox Russians.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_poland_lithuania_desc;Our ancient empire has been reborn. Let Poland-Lithuania exist once again
column2: and let our ancient enemies tremble!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: stop_poland_lithuania_desc;The Poland-Lithuanian union is at an end. We must put aside our dreams of greatness and return to our roots as Poland itself.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

form_baltic_states_desc;The baltic cultures must unite into a single nation if we are to resist the aggression of Russians and other great powers. A single people under a single flag! Now and forever!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_baltic_states_desc;The former Grand Duchy of Livonia
column2: a union of the northern baltic cultures
column3: would make for a stronger ally than either Latvia or Estonia would alone. Let us create a puppet United Baltic Provinces nation that will serve us now and forever.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: commodore_perry_expedition_desc;The Far East remains an enigma
column2: and one which is beyond the reach of most western powers due to the enforced seclusion of China and Japan. While China is largely spoken for
column3: Japan remains a potential target for American influence to expand. If we are to be taken seriously as a world power
column4: we must consider sending a force to negotiate for trade rights with the Japanese-- under the threat of military force
column5: if necessary.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: kanagawa_treaty_desc;With enough pressure placed on the Japanese
column2: they will be forced to the negotiating table. A treaty can be hammered out at Kanagawa which will see Japan opened to outside trade and influence
column3: and our superiority proven beyond the shadow of a doubt.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unequal_treaty_desc;The Japanese are at a disadvantage. We are in a position to bring them to the negotiating table
column2: and wrangle concessions of both trading privileges and reparations-- provided they are willing

column1: ansei_purge_desc;After the recent succession crisis of the shogunate
column2: there are too many opposing factions within the bakufu. We must take steps to ensure these men are retired
column3: forcefully or otherwise
column4: lest they continue to stir up problems in the name of the Emperor.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: overthrow_the_bakufu_desc;The time has come to restore Emperor Meiji to power. For too long has the imperial court been forced to remain but a figurehead
column2: with central authority remaining with the tyrannical Tokugawa clan. Japan must have one ruler
column3: an Emperor that can lead the nation into the future. Let us send our forces to Kyoto
column4: to seize the imperial palace and set the coup in motion.\n\n§RNOTE: To win this war
column5: you must occupy Edo or White Peace with the Shogun. You must not allow Kyoto and your capital to become occupied.§W;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: strengthen the military'
column3: this must become the objective of a unified Japan if we are to catch up with the technological advantage held by the West. We must face these barbarians at their own game
column4: and be better at it.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: under which the daimyo rule as feudal lords with very little central authority remaining to the government
column3: is an antiquated relic that must be eliminated. The domains shall be replaced with prefectures
column4: and the daimyos given roles as governors and bureaucrats. There will be resistance
column5: but all will come to understand that this is for the greater good of Japan.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_japan_desc;With the embracing of Western ideas and authority slowly falling away from the shogunate
column2: the government will naturally pass first to the imperial court-- and eventually
column3: with the extension of voting privileges to the landowners
column4: to the Japanese people themselves. This is a natural process
column5: and one the Tokugawa must embrace for the good of Japan.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: and our modern administration will get rid of Gaijin names and change them accordingly.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
and our modern administration will get rid of Gaijin names and change the island accordingly.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: boer_republic_desc;We have established a new nation
column2: dominated by the Voortrekkers and carved from the territory of African natives. This is a new opportunity for us to live outside of British rule
column3: now and forever.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: sand_river_convention_desc;The Boers of the Transvaal are becoming increasingly resistant to colonial rule. The time has come to meet with them at Pretoria and discuss the terms of their independence-- preferably subject to our conditions
column2: which are that they abandon all laws allowing slavery and that our influence within their borders remain strong.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: orange_river_convention_desc;The Boers of the Orange Free State are becoming increasingly resistant to colonial rule. The time has come to meet with them at Bloemfontein and discuss the terms of their independence-- preferably subject to our conditions
column2: which are that they abandon all laws allowing slavery and that our influence within their borders remain strong.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_north_cape_colony_desc;The northern cape colony rightfully belongs to us. We must take steps to assert our claim
column2: before our African ambitions come to naught.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_transvaal_desc;The Transvaal is boer territory and rightfully belongs as part of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_oranje_desc;The territory of the Orange Free State is Boer land and rightfully belongs as part of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_natalia_desc;The Natal is boer territory and rightfully belongs as part of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_south_africa_desc;With the Cape Colony under our control we can form a true
column2: united Boer republic-- one that at last will keep us from foreign domination and British rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_vereeniging_desc;The Cape Colony is under our control. Now is the time to sit down with our former colonial masters and work out a peace deal that will see it transferred back into Boer hands.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_umtata_desc;Now that the war with the Xhosa is done
column2: the time has come to discuss our mutual borders. With our colonists increasingly moving eastward
column3: we may need to incorporate some of their lands into the Cape Colony.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_hungarian_revolution_desc;There is no hope for us to continue. Our revolutionaries stand defeated and our country occupied-- we must submit!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
second_alaskan_purchase_desc;Interlopers have moved in on our claims in northern Alaska. Considering we have friendly enough relations with them
column2: perhaps we should consider a purchase of the territory before we resort to war?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: hawaiian_purchase_desc;Interlopers have moved in on our claims in the Hawaiian Islands region. Considering we have friendly enough relations with them
column2: perhaps we should consider a purchase of the territory before we resort to war?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_hawaii_desc;Our relationship with the Hawaiian government has borne fruit. They have asked to become a part of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
sell_alaska_desc;We have little use for our North American holdings. They are difficult to defend
column2: and would be worth far more to another country than it is to us. While it may take some time to find an interested and appropriate buyer
column3: perhaps we should start the process?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: rio_grande_treaty_desc;Our allies in the Rio Grande should be approached to find their willingness to turn over lands claimed by the state of Texas.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
apply_for_USA_statehood2_title;Apply for Statehood;Demande de rattachement en tant qu'État;Antrag auf Souveränität;;Solicitud de ingreso como estado;;;;;;;;;x
apply_for_USA_statehood2_desc;Our position on the North American continent
column2: and our traditional cultural ties to the USA
column3: make it likely that the USA would accept a petition of statehood from us. Doing this means our country will be annexed by the United States;Notre position géographique sur le continent nord Américain
column4: et les liens qui nous unissent aux Etats-Unis font que ces derniers accepteraient probablement une pétition sur une demande de rattachement en tant qu'Etat. En faisant cela
column5: notre pays serait annexé aux Etats-Unis.;Unsere Position auf dem nordamerikanischen Kontinent und unsere traditionellen kulturellen Verbindungen mit den USA machen es wahrscheinlich
column6: dass die USA einen Antrag auf Souveränität von uns akzeptiert. Dies bedeutet
column7: dass unser Land von den Vereinigten Staaten annektiert wird;;Por nuestra posición en el continente norteamericano y nuestros vínculos culturales tradicionales con los EE.UU. parece probable que nos acepten como estado de la Unión si lo solicitamos. Si lo hacemos
column8: nuestro país será anexionado por los Estados Unidos.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: canadian_dominion_desc;The Confederation of Canada now has self-rule. Our dominion is ours to govern
column2: as a new and emerging power not only within North America but in the world.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: vive_le_quebec_desc;Quebec is free! Finally the Quebecois has the right to govern themselves
column2: and seek out their destiny as an emerging power not only in North America but in the world!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
New Caledonia and Vancouver Island must be merged into a single entity -- both for the sake of their viability as well as to ensure their strength in the years to come.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: join_confederation_desc;Our position on the North American continent
column2: and our traditional cultural ties to Canada
column3: make it likely that Canada would be willing to negotiate our entrance into confederation. Doing this means our country will be annexed by Canada.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_the_rcmp_desc;With the acquisition of Rupert's Land and the North-West Territories it has become increasingly obvious that a new force is required to patrol those lands and keep order.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: linking the Pacific and Atlantic coasts
column3: is a dream that will ensure the unity of Canada -- though it is an expensive dream
column4: to be sure.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_heligoland_desc;Germany is eager to obtain the island of Heligoland
column2: currently in our possession. To avoid a war
column3: it might be in our best interest to arrange a trade: Heligoland in exchange for one of their colonies.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_kashmir_desc;For the good of the Empire
column2: we should create a new Princely State in the northern dominion of Kashmir.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: gold_coast_treaty_desc;We have experienced numerous conflicts with the Dutch government
column2: in regards to their colonial holdings on the Gold Coast and elsewhere. A treaty to solidify our hold on the Gold Coast
column3: and increase our mutual friendship and cooperation
column4: might be beneficial to both our nations.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: recognize_the_csa_desc;We will extend formal recognition of the Confederate States of America
column2: opening an embassy in their capital and formally establishing relations. The Yankees will
column3: of course
column4: not approve.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: and despite our wishes the United States stands divided. Our only option is to extend official recognition of the south's right to secede. If we cannot live under the same roof
column3: we shall be kind neighbors
column4: and perhaps even brothers in arms. May God help us all.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: second_declaration_of_independence_desc;As the founding fathers did before us
column2: so shall we stand up for our sovereign rights and not permit the interests of the North override what the South knows to be right and proper in our eyes. We shall be free
column3: and let no free man say otherwise.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: establish_panslavism_desc;The Orthodox Christians of the Balkans have lived under the boot of Muslim oppression for too long. The time has come to call on them to rise up against their oppressors. All Yugoslavia must unite!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_bukhara_title;The Great Game Comes to Bukhara;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_bukhara_desc;We must press our domination of Central Asia. This means that Bukhara must join our nation
column2: or stand forever more subject to British aggression in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_great_game_kokand_title;The Great Game Comes to Kokand;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_kokand_desc;We must press our domination of Central Asia. This means that Kokand must join our nation
column2: or stand forever more subject to British aggression in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_great_game_khiva_title;The Great Game Comes to Khiva;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_khiva_desc;We must press our domination of Central Asia. This means that Khiva must join our nation
column2: or stand forever more subject to British aggression in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: force_vassal_freedom_desc;A chance is upon us. Do we approach the great power who has so much influence in $COUNTRY$
column2: and ask them to intervene in our affairs? If we do
column3: we stand a chance of freeing ourselves from foreign rule. We also stand to lose a great deal
column4: as do they. We must proceed cautiously.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: no_freedom_desc;We attempted to free ourselves from foreign rule. We must wait until there is another opportunity
column2: as for now they are watching us closely.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: NOT_STRONGER_ARMY_THAN;Does not have a stronger military than ;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Cambodians have requested that we allow them to join the Dai Viet in protection by our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the most prertigious center of study for the italian language
column3: would gladly appreciate an economic help from your majesty to keep on with the good work on italian literature's history... and to pay those new paintings for the main hall;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: plombieres_desc;We should seek french help to kick Austria out of Italy.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: Giuseppe Garibaldi
column3: has called upon the Italian people to take arms in the name of unification. A volunteer army under Garibaldi's leadership will topple the southern governments and remove the stain of the Bourbon legacy from the peninsula forever.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: war_italian_independence_desc;It falls upon our nation to break the power that Austria has over Italy. Lombardia must be freed
column2: at any cost.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: italian_call_to_union_desc;The time has come to call upon the Italian people to rise up and unite under a common banner. Risorgimento must commence!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: it is time to reassert our Italian heritage. We must rejoin the motherland!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_tuscany_desc;For the good of Italian reunification
column2: the time has come for Lucca to unite with our Tuscan neighbours to the south.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we can take the Turks to the negotiating table and force them to hand over the remainder of Libya in exchange for any other provinces of theirs we hold.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: perfect_fusion_desc;Now that liberal forms have been introduced to our nation's government
column2: the people of Sardinia have come to view their separate status as more of a liability than a privilege. Perhaps an act of 'Perfect Union' between the Sardinians and the northern Italians is required to at last bring harmony to our house and aid the eventual reuinification of Italy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we can no longer claim a name that belongs to a union of Sardinia and Piedmont. We must become the Duchy of Savoy once more.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_piedmont_desc;Sardinia and Piedmont must be united into a single land once more!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_baltic_states_desc;The time has become to unite the Baltic nations under a single flag-- ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_baltic_states_desc;Uniting the Baltic nations under a single flag
column2: as a puppet to our nation
column3: will make for a much stronger ally.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: hip hip hip
column3: hourra !;Ein dreifaches Hurra auf Deutschland!;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: form_germany_AUS_desc;The great empire of the Habsburgs no longer exists
column2: but the unification of Germany under Austrian leadership
column3: as perhaps it was always meant to be
column4: still awaits us. Long live the German Empire
column5: one people ruled from the great city of Vienna!;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: austria_annex_SGF_desc;With the great empire of the Habsburgs now lost to us
column2: perhaps it is time to look north towards the unification of Germany. First
column3: however
column4: we must bring the South German Confederation under our own leadership.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_india_desc;The peoples of the Indian sub-continent must be united under a single banner: ours. It is the only way to keep us free of rule from European powers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_north_german_confederation2_desc;The conditions may be less than ideal
column2: but in order to maintain national security and strive towards North German hegemony
column3: we must approach our North German allies and create a confederation. Only with a united front
column4: under a single flag
column5: may we succeed!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_south_german_confederation2_desc;The conditions may be less than ideal
column2: but in order to maintain national security and strive towards South German hegemony
column3: we must approach our South German allies and create a confederation. Only with a united front
column4: under a single flag
column5: may we succeed!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Prussia is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: portuguese_civil_code_desc;The Portuguese Civil Code was unique for European civil codes
column2: in its characterization of laws in terms of the person and property; it was divided into four sections: the person
column3: the acquisition of goods
column4: goods
column5: and the defense of those goods or rights.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_tartu_desc;Now that we are free from Russian rule
column2: we should approach the Russian government and discuss the claims to Petsamo and southern Karelia before we end up in a territorial war we cannot hope to win.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
a Scandinavian Capital;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_gothenburg_desc;Göteborg is the center of the Scandinavian nation and would be a perfect Capital for our great nation and further unite our people.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reform_kalmar_desc;Once all of Scandinavia was ruled by a single monarch
column2: our people united in purpose. With our nation on the rise in power and prestige
column3: it is time to resurrect the Kalmar Union once more. For now this is just an idea
column4: and one we must convince the other Scandinavian countries to accept. In time
column5: they will come to see the benefit inherent in our common bond.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: SCA_customs_union_desc;The first step in uniting the Scandinavian nations is to eliminate the restrictions on trade between us. Open the borders!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
SCA_political_union_desc;The next step towards uniting Scandinavia is reducing the differences in our governments. Why have multiple agencies when there can simply be one
column2: providing all our people with the services they need? We must surrender our individual sovereignty for common gain.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: usurp_kalmar_title;Take Leadership in the Kalmar Union;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
usurp_kalmar_desc;While the Kalmar Union was not reborn in our nation
column2: it seems that a united Scandinavia will never come to pass unless a stronger country stands up and takes over the leadership role.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: kalmar_union_desc;We have agreed in principle to a closer bond with the other Scandinavian nations.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
leader_of_kalmar_desc;We are the leader of the movement to unite the Scandinavian people under a single flag.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
customs_union_desc;We are a member of a customs union
column2: designed to reduce the barriers in trade between the member nations.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: join_kalmar_union_desc;The time has come for our nation to take part in the growing Scandinavian union.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
spanish_restoration_desc;A period of relative peace and stability in Spain initiated by King Alfonso XII
column2: the aim being to create a new system of government with balance between the liberals and conservatives.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
a Holy Alliance was once formed between Prussia
column3: Austria and Russia. Perhaps the time has come to resurrect that alliance
column4: a common front between our three monarchies to stand against the wave of revolution and change and Europe?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_arab_union_desc;A nation must arise to lead the Arab peoples of the world into the future
column2: a greater power that would unite the Arab world from Morocco to the Mashriq.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: propose_danube_federation_desc;A new notion has arisen in our country-- one of extending the rights currently enjoyed by the Hungarians to the other Danubian cultures. We cannot
column2: after all
column3: expect that our nation will be able to peacefully continue on with two cultures dominating so many others. Provided the Hungarians will agree
column4: we could unite our cultures into a larger and more peaceful federation of the Danube.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_danube_federation_desc;Now that the Hungarians and all the Danubian cultures have been consulted
column2: the time has come for the new government to be implemented. Long live the Danubian Federation!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_danube_federation_desc;The concept of the Danubian Federation is no longer valid. We no longer control the territories that were once part of our nation
column2: and thus the time has come to give up the fiction and become Austria once more in truth.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_iberia_desc;We have proven our mettle and united the Iberian peninsula under our rule. Now the time has come for a new Iberian federation to be born
column2: one that unites all of the peninsula's cultures under a single rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_iberia2_desc;We have proven our mettle and united the Iberian peninsula under our rule. Now the time has come for a new Iberian federation to be born
column2: one that unites all of the peninsula's cultures under a single rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_iberia_spain_desc;The Iberian union is no longer the truth. We must put aside the fiction and become Spain in truth.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_iberia_portugal_desc;The Iberian union is no longer the truth. We must put aside the fiction and become Portugal in truth.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_with_greece_desc;Our proper place lies with Greece. Long live the Hellenic destiny!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_caliphate_desc;The dream of a true muslim nation: unite the peoples of Islam under a single banner
column2: one which could make the nations of the world shake before its might and cast fear into the hearts of men so used to treating our brethren as lesser beings.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: apply_sharia_law_desc;Ours is a nation based on fundamental religious rule. Thus it is incumbent that Sharia law be applied to its fullest extent-- in the interest of keeping peace and order.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
repeal_sharia_law_desc;Ours may be an Islamic union
column2: but it is no longer a nation based on fundamental religious rule. We must repeal the strict Sharia laws which have held back our nation for so long.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_la_plata_desc;The nations which were once part of the Viceroyalty of La Plata must be reunited under a single flag once again
column2: the platinean peoples bound together into a great nation
column3: a power to rule in the New World.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_maghreb_desc;The Maghrebi cultures of western Africa must be united under a single flag
column2: an Arab nation mighty enough to shake the world order to its foundations.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_transcaucasia_desc;The nations of the southern Caucasus must unite together
column2: a new power sufficient to withstand the might of Russian colonialism.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_transcaucasia_desc;The nations of the southern Caucasus must be united together
column2: a vassal that will serve as a loyal and mighty ally to our country.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the northern Caucasus region belongs as part of our country just as do its people.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_yemen_desc;Northern and Southern Yemen must be united under a single flag-- ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: or 'Imperial Reform Edict'
column3: will take the concept of Ottomanism-- the belief that equality among the Empire's religious groups will solve its social issues-- to the logical conclusion. Full rights will be granted to the Empire's minorities
column4: and laws passed to grant each millet the right to use  the religious law of its population. This will go a long way towards dealing with some of the nationalist strife the country has suffered
column5: and bring the Ottoman Empire into a new and multicultural age.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: republican_reforms_desc;Under a liberal and democratic government
column2: Turkey must be transformed into a modern and secular state!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_turkey_desc;We must strive to restore the Greater Turkish Empire
column2: one that stretches throughout the Middle East rather than in Europe.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: fsa_enact_anaconda_plan_title;The Anaconda Plan;Le plan Anaconda;Der Anaconda-Plan;;El plan Anaconda;;;;;;;;;x
fsa_enact_anaconda_plan_desc;Originally devised by General-in-chief Winfield Scott
column2: the Anaconda plan was a plan for subduing the Free Americans by means of a massive naval blockade
column3: and a military advance along the coast. By initiating blockades of FSA ports
column4: we can increase their war exhaustion by denying them essential goods.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: fsa_shermans_march_to_the_sea_title;Sherman's March To The Sea;La marche de Sherman vers la mer;Shermans Marsch zum Meer;;La marcha hacia el mar de Sherman;;;;;;;;;x
fsa_shermans_march_to_the_sea_desc;During the campaign he conducted in November and December of 1864
column2: Major General William Tecumseh Sherman applied the doctrines of Total War in what can best be described as a campaign of terror directed at the civilian population of the North. By operating deep inside Free American territory
column3: and by destroying much of the north's civilian infrastructure
column4: Sherman is often said to have broken the North's will to fight. Apply his methods
column5: and it might be the final nail in the FSA's coffin.;Durant la campagne qu'il mena en Géorgie de novembre à décembre 1864
column6: le Major-général William Tecumseh Sherman appliqua une doctrine de guerre totale
column7: que l'on pourrait plutôt qualifier de campagne de terreur ayant pour cible la population civile du Sud. En agissant profondément au sein des territoires confédérés
column8: et en détruisant la majorité des infrastructures civiles de la Géorgie
column9: Sherman est souvent cité pour avoir brisé la volonté de combattre du Sud. Appliquons sa méthode
column10: et cela pourrait être le dernier clou du cercueil des Confédérés.;Während des Feldzuges durch Georgia im November und Dezember 1864 wandte Generalmajor William Tecumseh Sherman die Doktrinen des Totalen Krieges mit nur als Terrorkampagne zu bezeichnenden Aktionen gegen die Zivilbevölkerung des Südens an. Durch Operationen tief in konföderiertem Gebiet und durch Zerstörung eines Großteils der Infrastruktur von Georgia brach Sherman vielen Meinungen nach den Kampfeswillen des Südens. Wenden Sie seine Methoden an - vielleicht werden sie der letzte Nagel im Sarg der Konföderation sein.;;Durante la campaña llevada a cabo en Georgia entre noviembre y diciembre de 1864
column11: el general William Tecumseh Sherman aplicó las doctrinas de la guerra total en lo que podría describirse perfectamente como una campaña de terror dirigida contra las poblaciones civiles del sur. Se cree que al operar en el interior de territorio confederado y destruir gran parte de la infraestructura civil del enemigo
column12: Sherman logró quebrantar la voluntad de combatir del sur. La aplicación de estos métodos podría suponer el último clavo en la tapa del ataúd del enemigo.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: raise_the_flag_of_freedom_desc;The time has come to take a stand
column2: to fight against the dominance of the south and in the name of free men everywhere!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: fsa_enact_radical_reconstruction_desc;We have won the war against the FSA
column2: and now the time has come to restore order in the north. Yankee nationalism must be suppressed
column3: and policies enacted to ensure that a resurgence of chaos never occurs again.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_the_union_desc;Our manifest destiny is to reclaim the United States of America which once was
column2: and thus to re-create it in the name of the Founding Fathers and the true spirit of independence.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_washington_capital_desc;The capital of the USA rightfully belongs in Washington
column2: D.C. Now that it is under our control
column3: we must make the symbolic gesture of restoring it as the center of the Union and proving the strength of America.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_richmond_capital_desc;The capital of the FSA rightfully belongs in Richmond
column2: Virginia. Now that it is under our control
column3: we must make the symbolic gesture of restoring it as the center of the Confederacy and proving the strength of the South.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_philadelphia_desc;Let us move the capital to Philadelphia
column2: a city under our control and a cultural and historical center of the North.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_boston_desc;Let us move the capital to Boston
column2: a city under our control and a cultural and historical center of the North.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_atlanta_desc;Let us move the capital to Atlanta
column2: a city under our control and a cultural and historical center of the South.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: recognize_the_fsa_desc;We will extend formal recognition of the Free States of America
column2: opening an embassy in their capital and formally establishing relations. The USA will
column3: of course
column4: not approve.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: and despite our wishes the United States stands divided. Our only option is to extend official recognition of the north's right to secede. If we cannot live under the same roof
column3: we shall be kind neighbors
column4: and perhaps even brothers in arms. May God help us all.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: so shall we stand up for our sovereign rights and not permit the interests of the South override what the North knows to be right and proper in our eyes. We shall be free
column3: and let no free man say otherwise.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: begin_hungarian_revolution_desc;We must strike a blow against the Hapsburg monarchy
column2: in the name of Hungarian independence!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: vassal_rebellion_desc;We have attempted diplomatic efforts to achieve our freedom
column2: and been refused. Now our only hope is to demand our independence on threat of all-out war.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_hindustan2_desc;We must unite the people of Hindustan under a single flag
column2: to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_marathas2_desc;The Maratha Empire was once the greatest force upon the Indian subcontinent. The time has come for it to rise once more!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_greater_bengal2_desc;The Bengal Empire once ruled over much of eastern India
column2: and the time has come to once again restake our claim. We must strike a blow against the forces of imperialism!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_dravidistan2_desc;We must unite the Dravidian people under a single flag
column2: to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_schleswig_desc;The duchies of Schleswig and Holstein have long been united and considered indivisible under the Danish crown
column2: but a question of royal claim to the duchies combined with the Holsteinian desire to join in the larger German Confederation to the south has led to considerable difficulty for King Frederick VII. The treatment of Danish people in Schleswig living under Holsteinian domination has led to a call for the duchy to be incorporated into Denmark proper. This is unlikely to be looked on favorably by the conservative German aristocracy in Holstein.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_japan_desc;The time has come to reconcile with the Japanese government
column2: and unite our nations for the good of the Japanese destiny.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule-- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators
